22a7: blan pa thug pa 'thung sheg ces zer na sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod pa mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer
22a8: byin no/ / de nas sman pas 'ongs nas dris pa 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs mi bde'o// ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo'o// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sa da ni
22b1: dron mo gsol cig/ de nas nad g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed nas des de la bsros te byin no// de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa mi bde'o// ci thug pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo zhig
22b2: bsros nas so/ / 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// de grangs te bsros pa lags kyis sang ni rang bzhin gyis dron mos mdzod la gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung
22b3: zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa las de nas khwa'i rtug pas/ de ma rung bar byas pas dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
22b4: pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas bsgo bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang ji tsam pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas
22b5: lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtod ba'i mtha' can dang / ba nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o// de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas gnas tsom pa na der thog mar gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi
22b6: rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas com pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// sems gtong ba'i mtha' can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas der thog mar gzhi rdo ba 'dren pa na nye 'khor gyi dge/
22b7: slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur bar nges par zung shig nges par zung shig/ ces bya ste/ 'di ni sems gtong ba'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad pa gses pa ste/
22b8: 'de ni ba nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// gnas stong pa gang zhe na/ spangs pa'i gnas ste 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bskos pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar brko ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das
23a1: kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsgo bar bya'o// bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la
23a2: gAN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad
23a3: lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsgo na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa
23a4: nang mtshams phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// gnas thams cad lags pa nang 'tshams dang phyir lo nye 'khor
23a5: 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsgo bar bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnam
23a6: las gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsgo bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
23a7: gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa nad mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i
23a8: gnas su bskos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du bcos pa dang / mtshams kyi nang tu zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs/
23b1: pa can na sder po ni seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi za bas khyer te 'ongs na yang dge slong rnams la
23b2: sbyin par byed do/ / dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang mu stegs can rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed// kha bzer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag sde dpon seng ge'i ched du byas ste sha khyer te 'ongs na ni de dag ma zos la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong
23b3: rnams la byin pa dang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi ched du byas pa'i sha ni zas so zhes ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i
23b4: sha bza' bar ma bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ched du byas par mngon du mthong ba rung ba'i ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no zhes thos pa dang / rang nyid kyi blo la rnam par
23b5: rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ / dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag
23b6: gi ched du byas par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyod kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa skyes
23b7: patshul las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no/ snyam pa ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mug dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong dag lcogs par gyur pas de rnams glos papa
23b8: ste 'dug pa dang bram ze dang khyim bad/ rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par byas pa'i kying stan pal ci'i slad du gros pab te bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdadzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ phrag dang bcas pa'i/
24a1: dus byung bas bsod snyoms lto 'drangs par mi rnyed pas kho bo cag ltogs te nyam chung bas des na glos phab ste 'dug go// de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ste zhal chus mi gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnangango // khyod
24a2: kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod de zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/
24a3: mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams kyis g.yang tshus bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smra/
24a4: pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza' bar 'dod na 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos
24a5: pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod ni sngar blangs zin to snyam du soms la sngar rnyed pa yang bza'
24a6: bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyis dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la 'gron du bos nas de rnams kyis zos pa dang bca' ba las lhag
24a7: ma zhig lus so/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyis snoms te bzhud la phyis gsol cig/ dge slong rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo // dod nas de yang za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i
24a8: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ga'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin no// snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di
24b1: la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu gi dang bcas pa'i dus byung ban bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyis zas la 'gron du bos te de rnams kyis zos nas bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste/ dge slong rnams dong ba dang
24b2: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang ba lags te 'tshal te mchis lagyod kho na la dbul lo// zhes de rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas
24b3: ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i dgon pa sdug bsngal 'di lta bur sngar yongs su btang ba'o snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la
24b4: 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / gleng gni ni mnyam yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub rdzogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas 'phags pa rnams la 'bul lo zhes re
24b5: ngag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas pa rnams la de dag byan pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzi
24b6: rten du ma thur ba de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas khyed rnams kyang da ni yon gnas su 'gyur ba lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na/ ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i shul rgyags dang /
24b7: bral te 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi 'am/ de lta bas na thugs rtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/
24b8: rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ dgun 'bru dang / bal po se'u dang / 'bra go dang / sta rga dang / yon tshe dang / shing tog ur ma na dang / shing tog u ru ma yi
25a1: ka dang / shing tog ni ko tsa dang / shing tog pa b+hu dang / shing tog sen tsi ka'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / chu na skyes pa dag phul pa dang /
25a2: dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang bar byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/
25a3: la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ud pa la'i rtsa ba dang / pad ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku mu dA'i sa bon dang / pad ma'i sa bon no// gleng gzhi ni gnyan yod na'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bang kan
25a4: 'khrugs par gyur to/ / de'i rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi blos ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mngaru rim gro byas kyi lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyis/ ma la bdag gis dri'o// snyam nas des sman pa
25a5: la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang ba ka na 'khrugs par gyur na de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa 'phags pa pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ gal
25a6: te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pad ma'i rtsa ba phal ba'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no/ / snyam du bsams nas ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du
25a7: phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po ba brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gis phyir byon/ des smras pa/ tshe
25a8: dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bar kan 'khrugs nas de la sman pas pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to/ / klu'i rgyal po rab bstan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltar na re shig gzhes shig/ de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas mi'i tshad tsam
25b1: gyi pad pa'i rtsa bdag gton cing pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad ma'i bdab ma'i sbyor ragathar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo / / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos pad mi rtsa ba gshegs pa la lta bar brtsams pa dang de nas klu'i rgyal po
25b2: rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci gzigs pad ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang spras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen pos pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed
25b3: bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas
25b4: mos par gyur to/ / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad ma'i rtsa ba khur cig bkur nas mnyan kyi la ba rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi mdun du zhog la shog shig/ de rlung gi shugs ltar
25b5: mgyogs pa'i mthas mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi bal glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur ro/ /
25b6: dus gzhan zhig nabal glang mo de las bal glang phru gra gcig 'brangs te 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra ba byin to// de nas bal glang mode skrag pas gcin rtug shor nas bal grang phrugu bor te bros so// de nas rgyal ba'i khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan
25b7: zhig shing gi ched du tshal du song ba las bal glang phru gu de mthong nas khyim du blangs te bsnan gsos bskyed de/ nor gyis bslangs pas ming nor skyor nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so// kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying
25b8: po la nor skyong skyes su bkur ba la/ de mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa'i skye bos nor kyis sbyangs pas na nor skyong zhes 'don to// pad ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos zos/ kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/
26a1: kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang bar byas nas kyang za bar 'dod na bdag cag gis spang bar byas so zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
26a2: la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo // pad ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de
26a3: la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe grong khyer bzad byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pa
26a4: dang / lug gi bran mo'o// khyim bdag lhag bsod nams che bas ji ltar shes she na/ gal te bad mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas nas thod ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na khyi ma bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so// lug gi chung mji
26a5: lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du snod du bcos pa ni brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i rked pa las lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya'am stod yongs su
26a6: bta bde'i tshad bzhin du gang par 'jug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ mug gi zhi lta yin no// phrag gi mna'am de lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don+da du dri s+yA na paN+Da stod byed par 'gyur te/ lhag gi man ma ni de la sbyin no// na
26a7: bran po ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang gi tshe zhing la rol gcig rmos pa de'i tshe zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te// lug gi bran po ni de lta yin no// lug gi bran mo ni ji ltar bsod nams che bar shes she na/ de gang gi tshe 'bras gtun gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe
26a8: bdun tsam da skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sod la dge slong
26b1: rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljo sa r+b+ba ni grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bza
26b2: byed du 'dod par spro ba de ni chos gos rnamapa so shi ces go shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing
26b3: yod kyi ba du byed dgashegs ces/ b+had pag la sa/ shig de btsun gshegs pa dang / thabs gcig du ngas ning krung b+har gang byed du dod par sgro ba de ni chos gos rnams ldang TIg/ tshe dang ldan pa pag/ 'a bzhin 'tshal zhes de slong
26b4: rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor zhib/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra btsam pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan
26b5: 'das kyis mnyan yod du tshe 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'khob du dong ba las de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa de rnams kyi sa dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang rong rong por gyur
26b6: nas bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong gau ta mas yul dbus nas sprugs so/ / de gal te 'dir 'ongs nagadon mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas kyang sprugs par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo// de rnams rigs kyi khyim dag du dong nas smras
26b7: pa/ chos thob par gyur cig/ chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de ci lags/ shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o// ci'i slad du re shig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis ji srid rgud pa ma
26b8: mthong ba de'i bar du 'dod do/ / 'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing du ma zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thabs med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa
27a1: dag gal te de lta na gang ga dus kho nar gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btu po//
27a2: 'phags pa dag gsungs shig mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas phyung la grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du chud cig rtswa sngon po rnams rdos shig/ 'dug
27a3: gnas rnams ni shig cig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni tshod cig/ chu rnams ni dug lkugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang thams cad bgyi'o// de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tsho/
27a4: thams cad gnas nas bton nas grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni brdas/ 'dug gnas rnams ni bshig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ni bcad/ chu rnams ni dug thugs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsarba
27a5: pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin parnye pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis skal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bla na
27a6: med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong rgyu zhing gshegs par bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la rig par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o snyam nas
27a7: de rlung btong ba'i lha'i bu la sgo ba/ song la chu dug can rnams skoms shig/ char 'bebs pa'i lce'i bu la sgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang / khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khod shig/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo
27a8: khyed kyis grong kyar wang byed kyi khor gdas pa shig/ de na ba chung gtod pa'i lha'i thus ni chu ga can rnams parnams so// chang bas pa'i lha'i dus ni deng yang rgya lan lag da dang ldan pas bgang ngo // rgya chen shi ris kyi lharnams
27b1: kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas ljongs rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to/ / mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsogs nas de rnams kyis rtog chen dag mdags te ljongs rnams
27b2: ci 'dra ltom shig/ de rnams dong ba las ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas slar 'ongs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ljongs rnams 'di lta bur 'byor cing rgyas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma
27b3: mthong ngo / mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa shes lnga de byed kyis mthong ngam/ re shig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang skur bar byed pa des/ khyed cag sbyar bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/ khyed cig rnam pa thams cad du ltas zin te/ blta
27b4: ba'i tha ma byas nas 'gro'o/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ khyed cag la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba legs la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba spang zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci ngas khyed cag gi
27b5: slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/ mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te gal te khyod cag sus kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la blta bar 'gro bas mi bya zhing / gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kar sha pa Na drug bcus gcad par khrims 'cha' na
27b6: 'dug go/ / de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu
27b7: mo grong khyer bzang byed du bag mang btang ba der ba'i kha na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das mun khung ni bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ni 'di
27b8: yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na bdag mar me thogs la 'bebs pa zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas them skas zhig sprul to// de nas de snying dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas
28a1: mar me thogs te them skam las babs nas bcom ldan pa das gang na ba der dong ste byin pa dang pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na mar me gzhag nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas
28a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par
28a3: dad lags so/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la byin pa dang de la ngan re nad med par gyur cig ces smos la 'di skad
28a4: ces kyang smros shig/ khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar da 'dir 'ongs na khyod sgro gcad nas bdug pas glo bAr ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de cig rigs sam/ gal te tshegs kyis khrims su bca' ba byas so zhes smras na// khyod kyi bu'i rkeng
28a5: pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya'am stong 'god par gtang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na khyod kar sha pa Ni drug bcu byin nas 'od mi nus sam/ zhes smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
28a6: zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas chas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la nad med
28a7: par gyur cig ces gsung ngo / / des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gshegs na khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa glo bur ba la ji ltar
28a8: khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba cig rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kar sha pa Ni drug bcu'i chad pas gcad do zhes dam
28b1: bcas so/ / khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya'am stong 'gor par btang na yang gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na kar
28b2: sha ba Na drug bcu byin nas khyod 'ong bar mi nus sum zhes gsung ngo / / des bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/ des kar sha pa Na drug bcu sgor gzhag nas bram ze'i bya
28b3: mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom
28b4: ldan 'das kyi khyim bdag lug gi bamam pa dang / bge la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen napa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas
28b5: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ / des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob
28b6: par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod las rten nas phal cher kun gyis 'thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan
28b7: 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grong byer gyi nang du kar sha pa Na'i phung po bcer te tshigs su gcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa// mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdog can lta 'dod pa// de ni 'jigs med/
28b8: snying gis shin du des byos la// myur du dengs shig de'i nor ni kho bos gzhal// skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram// des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta
29a1: bsan tshags kho nas khrims su bcas pa tshogs kho nas bzhig du zad mong / / 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so// de nas phan tshun sngos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang /
29a2: gnod byin lag na rdo rje 'dul ba'i skye bo la snyed rtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas rab dral nas srog chags brgya stong phrag dum kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo // de nas skye ba'i tshogs chen po
29a3: 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshang gcig tshun chad 'khor par 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gyang la gdan ba krams pa nyid la bzhugs nas sems can du ma
29a4: ngag gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de blo nas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so// zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bsrub pa'i bzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
29a5: du'o/ / / 'dul ba ka'i bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring po zhig tu chos bshad pas gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/
29a6: bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyis dus las yos par gyur to// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dris ma lags par rung bci lags/ bcom
29a7: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dang / bu ram dang / hwags dang / sha kha ra dang / btung ba dag go// de nas khyim bdag lug gi/ g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gon gyis shig
29a8: de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams lta gon byas so/ / de nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin bA ban+de pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i btud pa rnams kyis tshim par byas so// de nas
29b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang / skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtul te gshegs pa na khyim bdag lus gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
29b2: langs shul gyi snyun rgyags kyi zod kar sha pa Na dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa Na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis brang bar bya ba ma shes nas
29b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung bar byed pas so// rung ba byed pa med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
29b4: dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul len par gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor ngas 'chad par byed pa las dgongs
29b5: ste gsungs kyis mi blang ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar byi'i blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// /
29b6: dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'am dge tshul med na/ dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas rang nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar
29b7: byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol
29b8: bdag med 'di zhes bgyi ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs pa par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab bo zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis
30a1: zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyis lags/ nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa
30a2: dang smang ba byas pa dang / nang pa dang / dge bskos dang / lag gi blas so// dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las lam gyis dal nas bza' bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs
30a3: de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas de zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus pas 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs nas bza' bar bya'o// bye ma rnams kyi
30a4: gang yin pa de ni chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o/ / kha cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung ste zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug ma'i tshal bas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o// 'on kyang zas med par bya ma
30a5: nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par stsal te/ chu'i nang du mnyes la btud par byas nas de tshogs kyis btsags la btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/
30a6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag lug dang / lug gi mchis 'brang dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mos mra ci zhig bgyis na/ des na re drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing / bcom
30a7: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyi ma mnyes par ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs
30a8: rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag du 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i phar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan
30b1: rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis sa 'ang pi 'bab pas thung mas 'tshe ba'i mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro nas lung bstan to/ / mu ge rnam pa gsum ni na ma tog dang / dus gong dkang po dang / thung mas 'tsho ba'o// de la nam tog ces zla ba nin
30b2: tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzhag nas bdag cag shi nas 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / snum pa ste/ 'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za me tog ces bya'o// rus god
30b3: dkar po gang shen/ dus den mi rnams kyi rus pa dag bsdus nas re shig bcos te/ di tsam na rus pa de dkar bar gyur pa dang / de nas nga'i khro ba 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni dris gong dkar po dang 'brel bas rus gong dkar ba zhes bya'o// thur mas
30b4: 'jo gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul gyi sar gnas 'bru'i 'brum bu dag zung ma sa nas chu mang po'i snod du bcos nas 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni thung ma dang 'brel bas thung mas 'tshe ba zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas kyin byes tAda?N
30b5: snying cil sngogs su bcug pa/ bAr Na sten gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer ba dag nyon cig/ gas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas rna ma tog dang / dus gong dkar po dang / thung mas 'tshe ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung bstan
30b6: kyis/ khyed las gang dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni 'khod cig/ gang dag la med pa de dag ni gar dga' bar ded la mu gre med cing lo legs par gyur nas sma gshegs shig/ de'i tshe na bA rA Ni sI nA khyim bdag phyug cing rdor
30b7: mang ba longs spyod che ba/ 'khor yangs shing rgya che bzhig yod de/ des mngon pa ga/ ste smras pa/ kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/ ngas smras pa/ dben pa mchis so// de de nyid na gnas pa
30b8: las mra ge de rgyud ma kho nar byung bas de'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su zad pas 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad gi bar gyur te/ bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so// de nas khyim bdag des par mdzod rnams phyags pa las/ 'bras bre'u chung gang
31a1: zhig byung nas/ de'i chung mas snod du blugs te bcos so// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa nang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas cig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
31a2: tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing sor ba dang bA rA na sI'i phyin nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gom thogs te bA rA na sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ khyim bdag des kyang bza' ba bsdogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
31a3: de yang rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la rgyus nas de'i khyim du phyin to/ / khyim bdag des de lus 'dzes shing sems dad pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ 'dri bdag gis zos kyang gdon mi za bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis
31a4: sbal pa rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no snyam nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo kho bo'i bskal pa ni rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo// des bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim thab mi za na bdag gis ci ste bza' snyam nas des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi skal pa yang
31a5: 'di la 'bral lo/ de bzhin dro 'u dang / mna' ma dang / bran po dang / bran mos kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi bskal ba yongs su btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis/
31a6: chos ston gyi tshig gis ni ma yin pas des ngang pa'i rgyal po mdab ma rkyang pa ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so sor
31a7: skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems bstod pa yin pas shing rtsa ba nas gcad de 'gyes pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas smon lam ci 'dod pa gdab par rtsom ste/ khyim bdag gis smon lam gdab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam
31a8: pa 'di lta brabu la bya ba byas pa'i dge'i gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te bang ba dang mdod stong pa dag la bkas na mthong ba de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas kyad par du 'phags pa'i ston
31b1: pa rnams mnyem par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ chung mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te gcig
31b2: c ig gi don du snod du bcos pa de brgya'am stong gis zos kyang ji srid bdag gis sbyor ba ma btang ba'i bar du yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa
31b3: rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bus smon lo ma btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis rkang pa la lnga brgya pa'i
31b4: s nod btags te 'dug pa gal te brgya'am stong 'god par btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing
31b5: mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ mna' mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na des
31b6: brgya'am stong blugs kyang ji srid sbyor ba ma btang gi bar du zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur/
31b7: cig/ bran pos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te zhi rol cig rmos na rol bdun rmos par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams
31b8: kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bran mos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge
32a1: ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag cag gis gal te snod gang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams
32a2: mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs byin
32a3: gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste 'dug pa las/ rdza 'phrul gyis song pa'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs byin gyi steng du babs nas/ des kyen du blta bar brtsams pa las rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas de 'di mnyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdza
32a4: 'phrul gyi gshol chen pos yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyam mo/ / de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod rnams la bltas pa dang / ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo // des chung ma la smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i smon lam
32a5: ni rdzogs par gyur gyis da khyed cag gi blta'o/ / de nas bran mos 'bras snod gang tsam drus na bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur to// chung mas gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug/ nye 'khor/
32a6: gyi srog chags stong phrag du mas zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag des bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer bde shog shig/ bA rA Na sI ra sgra gsal ba dang
32a7: sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bya bas mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye ba lags so//
32a8: rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ shes ldan dag khyin bdag de 'ug shig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gang gi
32b1: tshe 'jig tan thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe khyod kyis mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ lha sa'i mdzod dang bang ba rnams bye/ 'on kyang de ring lo nangs bon bral ba'i 'bras bu de nyid du grub lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig/
32b2: des ska bas d+hus par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim padag spyod kyis bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyoms bral lam/ lha bdag gis phul lo// de yang lhag par dad bar 'gyur nas/ tshigs su gcad bsna smras pa/ kyim
32b3: tan las byung ba'i/ / skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing // de las pa n+d+ha btab pa ste// bzas bu dang nyid thob par byung // dge slong dgA dri sgyum du sems/ khyim bdag dang / khyim bdag gi rlung ma dang / khyim bdag gi bya dang / khyim bdag gi/
32b4: mna' ma dang / khyis bdag gi zan po dang / khyim bdag ga phrin mo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag lcag dang / lug gi chung ma dang / srag gi bu dang / lhag gi mnar ma dang / lug gi zan po dang / lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no// 'di sa
32b5: gis rang sangs rgyas la zla ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas drug char yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing de'i spyan snang bden pa mthong zhing / rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas ces kyang
32b6: 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byas kyi/ mi gnyis par ni ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar/
32b7: ba yin pas zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du// / sdom ni/ ke na'i bu yis gyung ba blangs/ ka shi'i tshong rdal nas thug dang / sdig
32b8: can du ni bca' ba dang / / 'gyod dang sbyar ba'i zas dag go// bcom ldan 'das yul a du ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe drang srong ke ni'i bu gnas ni yul a du ma na 'dug go// nyin par ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram ne
33a1: gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gang du 'jig rten skyod pa bzhi rnams la chos bshad na der ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong ke na'i bu thal bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das/
33a2: 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na der thul bar 'gyur ro// snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra/
33a3: rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi
33a4: phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa bltas na/ bdag cag 'jig rten skod pa bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga can la sgo ba/ lnga rtsen song la rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi 'gram cu
33a5: bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shoms te/ 'dus pa chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar drang srong ke na'i bu'i srungs ma gcig kyang skos shig/ des rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srungs ma gzhag
33a6: nas gnas shom par rtsom pa na de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke na'i bu ca co'i sgra langs nas srungs ma de la dris pa/ ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig/ des smras pa/ gdan shom par byed pa'i 'o// ci kho bo'i phyir ram/ khyod
33a7: kyi phyir ni ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir yin no/ / khyod 'di na ci zhig la sdong / khyod kho na srung ngo // ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'dra bar 'gyur bas so// des smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de su zhig srung bar byed par
33a8: 'gyur des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung / bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i srungs ma mdzad do zhes byas pa dang drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs
33b1: mdabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas u du mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ a du mar bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ zas byi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na dge slong gi dag 'dra dang /
33b2: babs gcig du udra ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rjeng budas kyis 'bab kyi 'gram du byin par 'gyur ba dalta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi grang la gtan pa gnas pa nyid
33b3: bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za du ma'i 'khor dang / dri zab rgya thag du ma'i 'khor dang / dri ba stong brag tu ma'i 'khor dang / dri za brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i nod byas mthub bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang nas
33b4: de song nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas shar phyogs su brten de 'dug go/
33b5: rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang // grul bum stong phrag du mi'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i mu tig gis thu pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang nas
33b6: deng song nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mu tig gis ga khanas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mig thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas kyi phyogs su brten te 'dug go/
33b7: rgyal po chen po mig mi ca yang kru ma'i 'khod dang / gru r+b+ha lagadu ma'i 'khod dang / grwa song gra/ dum pa cor dang / grubargya stong pagang ma'i 'khod dang / g+ha'i mai b+h+yo/ u d+ha m+b+ha dang / bad ma dang / kus ta dang / padam / rab dang / san d+ha ba ma
33b8: kyis thab bkang nas bcom ldan 'das gang na pa deng sang ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me ton / ut+pal dang / pad ma dang / kuT ta dang / pad ma dgar po dang / man dran pa rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dpas gnyis la
34a1: mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas nub phyogs su brten te 'dug go// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin du na'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin la zlag du pa'i pongs
34a2: gnod sbyin song brag du ma la ba dang / gnod sbyin brgya song zag du ma'i y-i dang / lha'i myig dang / gser gyis thub bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der song nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lba'i byig dang / gser gyis ga
34a3: bcom ldan 'das kyi gabs gnyis la mgathos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas byang phyogs su brten te 'ag go// de la dbus pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/ yul 'bor skyong dang 'phags skye
34a4: mtha' khob pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/ mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyi ni mi shes la/ gal te mahA
34a5: 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes pas/ mal ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do// gnyis la ni mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do snyam du dgongs nas rgyal po chen po
34a6: yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang / tshor ba bsel bar gyur pa dang / 'du shes 'gags pa dang / 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no//
34a7: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang / de dang skal pa mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrag du mchos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
34a8: 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de la khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa tsam du gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po 'phag/
34b1: skyes po dang / de dang skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyal bum pacu stod phrag dumachos rnams la chos kyi migardul med ci dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de sa com ldan 'das kyis rgyal ba chen po mig mi ba la ba 'bus pa// de lta na rgyal badzin kun /
34b2: ni/ dam/ de kha ze 'i sbyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po mag mi bzang dang / ded ga ya sa kurgya stong phrag dum chis rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med ci drim da pral ba skyes so//
34b3: denas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bral bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rtul po chen po mA hA/ tuSh+Ta/ sa shAn+ta/ sarba tra birA rI 'di nyid sdig bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po
34b4: namathos dang / de da skal pa mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin bcwa stong zag du mchis rnams mtshas kyi mig dus med cing dris dang thal ba skyes so// sam ldan 'das kyis dge sa pa/ dani dag yongs su mya ngan las 'a 'i dus la khad kyis nyen tshul
34b5: bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ gal te lha rnams la ni lha rnams pag med pa ladaga' ba mad bas phun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'on te mi rnams la ni tshe thung ba yin pas de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyi/ ma la ngas lha dang /
34b6: mirnams dang / dge slong 'di srang la gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'ad sgyum du dgongs nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor stong la ba 'astsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis dayongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas bsrung ba
34b7: shig/ rgyal ba can pa'i rags skyes pal pag yul pa/ rnam pa chen pa kyis kyad kyi phyogs nas bzung babyo shin/ rgyal po chen pa migs ba sa snrum pa/ rgyal la chen po nyid kyis kyang baphyogs lung ba
34b8: shi/ rgyal bache panam thas kyi bral ba 'gyus pa/ rgyam ban pa rgyad kyis kyang bya byug san zung byal gag/ de nas rgyam padzin pa bzhi rgya dag kyis bcom ldan las la 'dagad ces gas pa to// sa maldan
35a1: 'das kyis bka' di skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsung bar bgyi lags so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
35a2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams gtad nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang bstan pa'i don gyi
35a3: byab la brtson par gyis shig/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po chem
35a4: po bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshegs rnyed pa
35a5: zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag du 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gor ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i rnams kyi tshe le nyi khri thub pa na ston pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
35a6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i na klu gnyis shig gnas te/ dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin no// shing shal ma brtsegs pa na yang
35a7: nam mkha' lding gnyis yod pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / gtsug gi dbang phyug go// gang gi tshe dbrags 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshad gnyis sa'i 'og du 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gnan zhig na
35a8: dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang / de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis gnod par bya bar brtsams pa las/
35b1: ri rab la rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bo cag gis khyed cag gnod pa byas na sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ de gang gis na kho bo cag khyed dang phrad nas ri ba la rlung dang chu bzhin du
35b2: rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// de gnyis
35b3: gyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo // zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas de dag phyin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
35b4: spyan snga nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag gis chos thos nas dong pa de dag de gnyis kyis mthong nas/ nam mkha' ldeng de gnyis kyis klu dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/ 'gro ba pa pi dag su dag yin/ de gnyis kyis
35b5: rgyas par smras pa dang / nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar bdag cag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs la smon lam gdab bo zhes de
35b6: gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ / dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni sngar blangs so// de nas lhan cig 'dus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
35b7: sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su mchis pa
35b8: de bzhin du bdag cag kyang dge 'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhe bgyi ba gang lags pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo
36a1: brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang de bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du
36a2: bdag cag la chos bshad de bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su mchi bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ klu dang nam mkha' lding bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba
36a3: bzhi po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no// dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no// 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni mig mi bzad yin no// gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam
36a4: thos kyi bu yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'jig rten skyong pa
36a5: bzhir gyur cing nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // chos bshad pa de drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas/ mchog du dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
36a6: de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad
36a7: pa mdzad do/ / de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ btung ba brgyad ba tso tsa'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rgya shug gi btud pa dang / a shwa tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang / rtsub 'gyur
36a8: kyi btung ba dang / 'bra go'i btung ba dang / rgun gyi btung ba khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags
36b1: pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas btung ba brgyad po dag bzhes so// bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
36b2: slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus su mnyes/ dus su bcags/ dus su byin gyis brlabs na dus su longs spyad par bya zhing dus ma yin par yang longs spyad par byal/ nam gyi thun dang po bas nas ni longs spyad pa
36b3: mi bya'o/ / btung ba brgyad po 'di dag tus su byin len byas la dus ma yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus su mnyes
36b4: la/ dus ma yin par btsags dus ma yin par byin gyis bslabs pa ni longs spyod par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus ma yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags pa ni zas kyi 'og du yang long spyad
36b5: par mi bya la/ nam mi cha stod 'das na yang longs spyod par mi bya'o// de nas drang srong ke ni'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas bcom ldan 'das gdan pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'dis
36b6: ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke ni'i bu la tsang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas drang srong
36b7: ken be bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar mdzad de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu a du mar gshegs so//
36b8: de na rang meng / ma budamam 'das par 'das nas na mi rnamam la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag shes shig/ bzhin pa sa dag pa bshin/ ga dag gshegs shig/ zus shig// zhal zas dag kris pa kyis shin/ bkang sa dag rgya
37a1: gyis shig/ de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu'i sring me'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba gnas de nyid du nub mo gnas btab pa las/ drang srong ri bos drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la smra ba thos so//
37a2: ces nas kyang drang srong ke na'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong ci khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron du pos sam/ yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'am/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshegs/
37a3: sam/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pas sam/ des smras pa/ ri bo khe bo ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron du bos pa yang ma yin/ yul ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/ pho brang 'khor na gnas
37a4: pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos
37a5: pa thos nas/ bsdu thams cad zing zhes byed nas gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa/ drang srong sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ ri bo dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sgra dang kha spu bregs gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pas yang dag
37a6: pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ ri bo sangs rgyas shes bya ba ni de yin no// ri bos smras pa/ drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya
37a7: ba 'di ci zhig yin/ drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/ ri bo rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yang yod/ bram ze'i rigs
37a8: dang / rje'u yi rigs dang / dmang rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar
37b1: gong ma bzhin du ste/ ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// ri bo dge 'dun 'di dang sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di kho bos gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas drang srong ri bos sangs
37b2: rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig du 'dug nas
37b3: drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
37b4: tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/ / drang srong ri bo dang 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to//
37b5: 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu dgu pa/ de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
37b6: du'o/ / des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na ri bo rab tu byung ba mthong nas des smras pa/ ri bo khyod rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung ngo // legs par byas so// shin tu legs par byas so// kho bo yang
37b7: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas rab tu 'byung ngo / / de nas drang srong ke na'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang
37b8: gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas
38a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yon sngo ba dang chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/ / de nas dang song ke ni'i bras rgyu lkug/ de dag thams cad btan pa'i chos byas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dang
38a2: dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig du 'dug go/ phyogs gcig du 'dug nas drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs
38a3: pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang snyan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// drang srong ke na'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
38a4: la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong po de dag dang / 'bab tu rab tu bzang po'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur
38a5: dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze'i ka phi na la dge slong lnga brgya btang ngo do// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu la nyos brgya
38a6: lnga bcu gtad ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag
38a7: yin pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
38a8: pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni shes rab che ba rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang / rdzu 'phru ba che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi nas gdams dag phog
38b1: pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mongor
38b2: sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka phi nas gdams dag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ maud gal gyi
38b3: bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang / shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa lnga la rab du bkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te so sor 'khor lnga/
38b4: brgya lnga brgya yod do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis las gcig shi nas de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas drang song gcig shos de'i drung du 'ongs
38b5: ba dang / des de rnams mig mchims gang ba mthong nas dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyi mkhan po de gang song / grum mo// des bsams pa/ bdag 'das na bum ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs sa 'gyur gyis/ pa la bdag
38b6: g+has 'di dag bsdu par bya'o/ / sam nas des de rnams dbugs phyung sna bsdus so// ris pa nas gzhan zhig na dang srong de yang nad kyis bebs par gyur nas/ de'i slob ma mchog gsus yod pa la des gcig la ni lbu baH/ gnyis pa lan/
38b7: las lta/ gzub bral ni sa la lnga ban gtad// dam sa babs dang na par byar te// delas bcugan pa gang yin pa das ning snar gzugs med pas bams la bgod pa de ltang ga tu dag pags/ nyis bas ma
38b8: ba gang nam na lag mal kyi lamasas da pa sna das ga sa/ sa yul sra pa btsigags kyis da sa la ga pa ga ga gcigs/ gas
39a1: sems/ ra' ched 'dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ka bi na 'di nyid yin no// nyis bcwa lnga bcu gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge
39a2: slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ / gcig shos kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no// 'on kyang dge slong ka pi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnon po
39a3: yin no/ / maud gal gyi bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring po yin no// shA ri'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po brtul po yin no// gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag phog par ma gyur na de dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang ltogs par mi 'gyur ro// ke ni'i
39a4: bu ni ral pa can/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pa// rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis ni// thams cad 'thun par mnyan par bgyis// ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni// dus gcig cig na ston pa po// dpa' chen nyan thos thabs gcig du//
39a5: gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so// ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni// zas kyi zhal te byed pa dag/ bram ze ri bas mthong gyur te// mthong nas ke na'i bu la dris// bag ma len tam 'on te ci// rgyal po yul 'khor 'gron pos sam// khyod kyi mchod/
39a6: sbyin che dras sam// dris pa de ni bdag la smos// bdag ni bag ma mi len la// rgyal po 'am yul 'khor 'gron ma bos// bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog/ gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so// ri bos sangs rgyas sgra thos nas//
39a7: yid skye ba ni skyes gyur te// sangs rgyas de tsi kI na'i bu// dris pa de ni bdag la spros// shAkya'i rigs la skyes pa yi// ston pa gang zag bla med yod// de ni chos kun blo ldan pas// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// 'dus byas 'jig pa'i 'grur
39a8: pa'i ches/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la// de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing // da ltar byung ba rnams kyang gzigs// mngon shes bya ba ji snyed pa// de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//
39b1: de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// mngon par shes bya mngon shes byas// bsgom par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms// spang bar bya ba spangs pas na// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// gang zhig bltam par gyur pa na// rgya mtsho bor bcas pa yi//
39b2: sa 'di rab tu g.yos mdzad pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig bdud dang nag po ye// rtsa lag gzhon bcas bcom nas ni// de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa// de la thal sbrang phyag 'tshal lo// bA rA Na sI'i grong bzhud nas//
39b3: gang gis rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo de skor ba// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis 'dod chags bcings pas bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang gis gdungs pa'i// sems can mang po grol mdzad pa'i// de la thal
39b4: sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan gang zhig ni// rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na// shAkya'i sras po 'od mdzad la// de ring nyid la skyabs su 'gro// tshal sdug yid du 'ong ba de// gang na ba ni bram ze'i chos// dri za rgyal po lta bu yi/
39b5: sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar 'gyur// na bza' ngur smrig 'od ldan de// gser mdog nyi ma'i 'od zer can// de bzhin gser ni btsem yi// gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin// sa la shing gi me tog dang // kar ni ka ra'i me tog 'dra/
39b6: rin chen sna tshogs spras pa yi// rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no// n+ya gro d+ha lta bur ni// chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang // khor yug 'dom gar 'od kyi ni// kun nas snang ba dag du mdzad// rgyal srid rgyas dang nye dur bcas// 'dod pa kun dga'
39b7: spangs nas ni/ / rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i// thub pa dben pa rnams la dgyes// spos dang ldan pa'i seng ge ni// nags su 'jigs pa med pa ltar// seng ge lta bur bsnyengs med gsung // bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur//
39b8: zhal 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni// tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung // rnga yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba dag pa nam mkha' la// rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs skor ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil
40a1: 'khor lta bu'i/ / sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa// nam mkha'i ros la mdzes lta yi// sangs rgyas mun pa bral gyur cing // mdzes pa bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// ji lta bya ba'i khyu mchog ni//
40a2: nog dang ldan pa mi g.yo gnas// skyes bu khyu mchog stobs bcu ldan// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i// rgya chen tshad bzung med lta yi// sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bla
40a3: mthong / / nag po'i phyogs las des byung ba'i// nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba dang / me yi phung po 'bar ba lta'i// go ta ma sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur rgyal po// zham ring dbye bas yongs bskor ltar// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sa dang /
40a4: rgyas ni// dgra bcom rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes// 'dod pa rnams la dbang sgyur dang // ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// thub pa dbang ni sbyar bar mdzad// gang thos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal mtsho
40a5: chen las sgrol ba/ / sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung gang yin dang // sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang // lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis// sbrang rtsi ma skol re lta bu'i// bden pa dag ni rab tu 'chad// nor med rnams la nor sbyin
40a6: zheng/ / nang pa rnams ni dpyad kyang mdzad// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas// sgra dgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// mun par gyur pa'i sems can dang // blun po lam gol rgyu ba dang // bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// lam ni drang po rab tu ston//
40a7: 'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar zhing // gti mug rab 'bar skye dgu rnams// ji ltar sprin chen char 'bebs ltar// thub pa chen pos zhi bar mdzad// gzugs dang kha dog stobs ldan pa// de dang 'dra ba yod ma yin// sku 'khregs stobs mchog ldan pa ni//
40a8: ri bo bzhin du shin tu gnas// rnyed dang ma rnyed bde sdug dang // smad pa dang ni bstod pa dang // grags pa dang ni ma grags pas// chu yis pad ma bzhin mgos// srog gcod pa ni rnam spangs te// ma byin pa la dga' mi byed// bden pa gsung zhing tshangs
40b1: par spyod/ / de ni phra ma spangs pa yin// tshig rtsub bdag ni mi gsung zhing // rus su bab pa 'jam por gsung // de ni 'dod la brnab sems med// skye bo rnams la de sems byams// yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs// ting nge 'dzin stobs spyod yul
40b2: bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la gshegs// lha dang mi'i sgra dag ni// gang yin rnam pa sna tshogs gsan// nyon mongs can nam dge yang rung // pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen// gang dang gang du ston /
40b3: gnas pa// sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang // sems can 'gro drarang 'ong ba yi// 'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen// zag bzad cing me ldan pas// nyer zhi shin tu mya ngan 'das// dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba// mtsho ni gang ba bzhin du gnas// pad ma'i//
40b4: rdzing na glang po che// dam pa drug bcu lon pa ltar// mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas// bram ze dga' bo thob par 'gyur// ri bo bcom ldan 'di 'dra ste// rI yi sku ni skyes chen gyi// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // gzi brjid ni/ yi phung po bzhin//
40b5: gang gis lo brgya tshad par mi/ skyeb pa'i bsngags pa brjod byas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pas// des ni mthar byin mi 'gyur ro// bram ze gang gis de mthong ba// de yi rnyed pa bla na med// gang gis mthang bas skya bsang ba// de yi nAd pe ra bas 'phag
40b6: bramra ze ri bos thub chen gyi/ / bsdigs pa thos nas skyo bar gyur// dben pa'i sems kyi tog pa yis// ke na'i bral 'di skad smras// mer gyur pa la bdag gis ni// de 'dra'i bsngags pa thos ma myong // ken 'chad pa dang sbyar na// de ni 'jig rten kun gyi/
40b7: gtso// tshod pa nor dag don gnyer ltar// khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs// de kha bkur skye gus byos dang // bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur// bram ze khye'u ni lnga brgya yis// slob ma dag gis mdun pa dang tau// sangs rgyas bzhugs pa
40b8: bzang po des/ / bram ze ba song bar gyur// lha rnams kyi ni dga' 'tshal ltar// me tog sheng ni phun sum tshogs// rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing // bya yi tshogs kyis bstan gyur pa// mi min gdug pa mi chub// shAshwa'i sras kyis bstan/
41a1: pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas su ni// de nas bram zes zhugs par gyur// ma rul 'dul ba kha lo sgyur// skyes bu dam pa mthong nas ni// ri bos yis ni tshig gsol pa// shes ldan cig sman mi mnga' 'am// ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs
41a2: can/ / sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas// ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa// ngal nang ni yod min te// nyes pa med cing sdig pa med// the tshom thams cad rnam par chad// rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa// da ni zag mad tha ba med// 'jig rten na ni
41a3: rdul med rgyu/ / gtsang zhing dag la dri nga med// des na bram ze nga gtsang ste// kho na dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal// ri bo khyod kyang 'ongs pa legs// stan 'di la ni legs par 'dug/ bram ze ri bo bde 'am khyod// lus ni ngal bar ma gyur mong // dpA
41a4: po chen po khyod mthong bas/ / thub pa chen po da ltar bde// rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar// yid ni rab tu dga' ba yas// de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i gtam// rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni// de nas bram ze 'dzem pa dang // dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug
41a5: par gyur/ / klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin// rig byed gsum gyi rig mthar phyin// zlum ze ri bo 'dug na sa na// thub pa'i mtshan la rtog par byed// 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po yi// skal mtshan ni sum ban mthong // ljags srab mdoms sba sbubs
41a6: nub pa/ / gnyis la ri bo the tsom za// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la// the tshom yid gnyis gyur nas ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs// bden pa'i mtshan la yengs zhus pa// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum bcu rtsa gnyis
41a7: thob pa gang / / gau tam khyod kyi sku dag la// gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bab po// mi yi dam pa mdoms kyi ni// srab skyabs su nub lags sam// lcags bzang zhes ni bgyi ba yang // ci gathung ba ma lags grang // thub chen bdag gis ci nas kyang // lngam//
41a8: ring gro bar chud gyur pa// ljags srab myur du rkyang mdzad de// bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// rnam par 'dren rnams 'jig rten du// brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung // u du ma 'ba' ra'i me tog bzhin// thub pa chen po dkon pa lags// sos
41b1: ka rkom pa chab dang ni/ / bkres pa la ni ga yar zas dang // nad pa sman la ji lta bar// ston pa la ni bkur stir bgyid// ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas// ri bo la ni srar gsungs pa// bram ze ze tsom sra
41b2: par gyis/ / ljags kyi spyan dang snyan dag ni// rab tu khebs par ljags ring gis// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul bzhi la mkhas pa yi// rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pra// thub pa'i mdoms sgra sbubs nub pa//
41b3: bram ze ri bos mthong bar gyur// thub pa chen pos mtshan rnams la// the tshom med cing zug rngu phyung // sems kyi rtog pa rab dga' nas// ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa// sum bcu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams// bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa// de
41b4: kun khyod kyi sku 'di la/ / yongs su rdzogs te mtshang med// dge dang ldan pa spyod pa bzang // legs par 'khrungs pas sgra na sdug/ nyan thos dge 'dun dbus na ni// gdugs bangal ba ni lta bur mdzes// dam par bsngags pa khyod la ni// dge sbyong
41b5: dngos pos ci zhig bgyi/ / mi yi lha mchog khyod lta bu// dpung gi yan lag bzhi dag dang // rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os// sa bdag rgyal por mdzad nas ni// sa stengs 'khor los sgyur bar mdzod// ri bong ni
41b6: rgyal po ste/ / chos kyi rgyal chen bla na med// da ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed// nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te// nga ni dge ba'i rigs las 'khrungs// bdud dpung btsas par bcom nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub
41b7: dam pa thog/ bram ze de'i dran 'khor lo ste// nga yi shes rab blon po yin// brtson 'grus shugs 'gyogs rta po ni// btang na dngal 'byung ba yin// nga yi nor bu dam pa na// ting 'dzin mun pa gsal byed yin// btang snyoms glang chen dam pa ste// bskul
41b8: dang d+ha ga pa yin/ / chags bcas bud med 'dod pa ltar// bram zang dga' 'dod pa yin// bram ze de'i khyim bdag ni// shin tu sbyangs nor dam pa yin// nga yi byang chub yan lag bdun// 'jig rten kun 'das rin chen des// long bar gyur
42a1: gnas 'os/ / zhing gshin pa la zhugs pa yi// sbyin bsreg rnams kyang len pa yin// brtson 'grus dam pa brtsams nas ni// ngas ni zag pa rnams bcom mo// chu bo che las rgal nas ni// bsgral ba'i phyir ni gnas pa yin// ji ltar seng ge
42a2: mche ba'i stobs/ / nags su srog chags dang 'phrad nas// chung dang 'bring dang chen po'ang rung // de la mtshungs par snun pa sbyar// mi yi seng ge rnam 'dren pa// rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni// byis pa 'am 'bring dam chen po la// mnyam
42a3: por chos ni ston par mdzad/ / gau tam khyod kyis 'di ru ni// nang ba bdag ni the tshom sol// zug rngu 'byin pa rnams drang ni// mig mkhan rnams kyi mchog khyod lags// khyod kyi the tsamA gsal bar byas// bram ze khyod ni 'dun par gyis// grags
42a4: ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ / mthong ba rnyed par bka' ba ste// gang zhig 'di na rnyed dka ba// brgyal man ni lan 'ga' 'byung // bram ze rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas // chos kyi rgyal po tha med yin// de bzhin gshegs la ris gsol pa//
42a5: rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bka' stsal te// ma 'dres 'khor lo bskor mdzad na// gau ta ma jiska gsang ba bzhin// khyod kyis 'khor lo bskyod pa gang // rjes su mkhas par bskor bgyid pa// stong pa nyid 'khrungs nyan thos ni// sde dpon dag tu su
42a6: 'gyur lags/ / bram zing la nyan thos ni// shes rab mtshungs pa'i sras yod pa// nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa po// mang du thos pa shA ri'i bu// mdud pa kun las rnam grol ba// nyer zhi zag pa med yod de// ngas ni 'khor lo gang bsnong ba/
42a7: mkhas pa rjes su skor bar byed// e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dang ni// e ma'o nyan thos phun sum tshogs// e ma'o rin chen dam pa gsum// 'jig rten 'byung ba ngo mtshur che// bzang po khyod kyi nyan thos sku// bdag gis g.yar gyis blang bgyis la//
42a8: se ma'o chos kyi bcung 'tshal nas// shin tu mya ngan 'das par bgyi// sems tog rab tu dag 'gyur na// de nas bram ze stso gyur te// dben pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni// 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so// nags nas ge sgra 'byin ltar// bsam
42b1: cing gnyid log pa'i/ / skye dgra 'di dag sang par b+ha// phyogs rnams kun nas dargyal bas// ngal sngo ba'i dgra yod min// nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa la// 'bar bani pa dag nga yi sras// rdzu 'phrul
42b2: kun dga' bun sum tshogs/ / lam gyi bzhi mdor sprul pa byas// mdo sde skyes pa'i rabs dag bkram// skyes bya chen po rnams kyi stan// rnaMm thar gsum gyi sgo mo can// dran pa'i bsrungs ma rnams kyis bsrungs// ngo tsha tshul yod
42b3: kyis g.yogs pa'i/ / grong khyer sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis// bstan pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs// rgyal po nga ni bzhugs nas su// da ye chos kyi g.yul sprad de// chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas// bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom byas te//
