42b4: nga ni byang chub byir dbang bkur// tshad med pa dag rab bsgoms pa// nga yi rgyan du bdog pa yin// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yis// nyon mongs pa dag rab tu bzlog/ pha rol rab tu rgol bcom te// rnam par bcom zhing rmeg med byas// gros
42b5: chags rnamal 'jig rten 'dir/ / snang ba sbyin zhing yang dag spyad// nga ni bde bar gnas bcas nas// ye shes kyi ni mtshon gyi spyad// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas yin te// zhi gnas dag ni 'dzin stengs yin// tshul khrims shing rta sgra stan
42b6: la/ / nga yi lhag mthong kha lo sgyur// bzod dang nges pa'i go bgos nas// lam bsgoms pas na g.yul dor ni// gang gis sgrib pa 'joms pa yi// dbang po lnga yi dong ba dang // gang gi nyon mongs thag 'jud pa'i// yang dag spong ba bzhi
42b7: po yis/ / ngas ni dpa' bo g.yul sprad de// chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas// bdud dpung bcas par bcom byas te// nga ni byang chub dbang bskur ro// reg pas ma rig bcom nas ni// phung po skye zhing 'jig pa can// g.yul gyi rtse mo rgal te nga //
42b8: skyed gra byang chub phyir sangs rgyas// gang gi skye dgu gnod byed pa// 'jig rten chom rkun chen po gsum// 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug rnams// de kun nga yis bcom pa nas// mngon shos kun gyi stobs byung bas// nga ni dgra bcom mon
43a1: gtan chen po'i zug rngu 'byin/ / spyan dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa// 'di ni shes ldan dag nyon cig/ gang dag 'dod pa rjes su song // gang dag mi 'dod de dag deng // shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la// de ring kho na rab 'byung ngo // /
43a2: tshangs srod 'di la legs spyad cing // lam nyid shin tu go ma byas nas// bag yod pa la gnas pa yi// rab byung 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur// gal te khyed cag rab 'byung zhing // bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na ni// bram ze ral pa 'di bregs te//
43a3: bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bya// sems rtog rab tu mgu gyur pas// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te// bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas// bram ze ri bo des gsol pa// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po// 'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni// thub chen
43a4: rab tu 'byung ba dang / / bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob par 'tshal// de nas ston pa thugs rje can// drang srong chen po thugs rtse bas// dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas// de dag bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur// shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu// rdzu 'phrul
43a5: ldan pa maud gal dang / / dga' yod gnas brtan ka pi na// spobs pa rtogs par khong du chud// chu bo bzang po'i 'gram du ni// yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du// spobs pa byang ba'i gnas brtan gyis// de dag la ni gdams ngag phog/ der ni de las
43a6: sa kyi gtam/ / rjes su 'thun pa de shes nas// ring po ma thogs rnam grol te// dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod// de dag mthong thob bde gyur bas// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la// rab tu mgu bas phyag
43a7: byas so/ / dam pa'i chos dang tshogs gtso dang // rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang bgod pa dang // bag yod pa la phyag byas so// de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa 'am// bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas// sangs rgyas
43a8: chos dang dge 'dun la/ / bkur bsti byas la skyabs su dong // 'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis// 'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags// gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la// bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad// chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen// sangs rgyas
43b1: bstan pa chos kyi ni/ / bdag nyid chen por mchog gyur la// thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu sten// ke na'i bu'i tshigs su gcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ ka shi'i tshong rnam
43b2: rba byon to/ / ka shi'i tshong rdal de na sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pa sbrang gnyis yod pa las bus smras pa/ pha bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka/ sha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa
43b3: bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun sku mnyel gyis/ / ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/ de la ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam// 'on te dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren des smras pa
43b4: khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig/ nga ni thug pa lta gon byed do// des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so// de yang me long zhig thogs nas/ tshong dus su song ba las// des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/
43b5: des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di lta bu'i mkhyen pa yang mnga' 'am// des smras pa yod do// gal te mnga' na bregs shig/ des breg par brtsams pa dang khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sang ngo // des smras pa/
43b6: 'phags pa bregs lags sam/ khyim bdag bregs zin to// de mgu nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas khyod mchog ci bzhed pa don to// des smras pa/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gri dge 'dun nas thug la spyan drangs
43b7: kis nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa nas thug lta khyod ci rung bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag 'bral gyis bzhung la spyan drongs shig/ nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas de song ngo // de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod
43b8: pa zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdams bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na// dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag ngan pa la 'gron du bos na
44a1: kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes de rnams kyis blangs pa'i nasas de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ngan pa la 'gron du bos na kha zas
44a2: bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes pa gang byung ba de ni dge slong dag rigs dang mthun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyis// de lta bas na dge slong dgis rang gi bzo' stan
44a3: par mi bya/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi bya'o// srel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sngon sman pa yin na gca' khab kyi snod srel ba dang / sngon yi ge ba yin na ram phyis srel ba dang / bzo mkhan rab tu byung na khab ral srel
44a4: pa ni ma btogs so/ / bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas sdig can na srin bu pad ma'i 'tshal stug po na bzhugs so// sdig can ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa
44a5: 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig ste/ bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas sdig can srin bu pad ma'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos rwa
44a6: kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyang yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srid bu pad ma'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so// zhes thos kyis/ gal te bdag cag re res sarba
44a7: rgyus la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshed gsol na/ gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas ye khrims zhig bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sras kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs chod
44a8: gsol bar me bya zhing bdag cag 'dras pa kho nas gdugs tshong gsol bar bya'o/ / bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/ de la tshogs kyis kar sha pa ni drug bcu'i chad pa gcad do// de nas sdig can gyi gyad
44b1: thams cad 'dras nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig du 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang
44b2: ldan pa'i gtam kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nam/ cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bor gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig/
44b3: tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nam/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor
44b4: zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan
44b5: 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs te song ngo // gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni de nyid na 'dug pa dang / de la tshe
44b6: dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan ci khyod dad par gyur tam/ des smram pa/ bdag dad thar ni ma gyur mod kyi 'on kyang tshegs kyi khrims su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/ kar sha pa Na drug bcu'i cha pas gcang do zhes bya ba'i bar gong
44b7: pa bzhin du'o/ / khyed chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig/ btsun pa de lta lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang sde chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na
44b8: ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dang / tshes la ma lags/ dge 'dun la ma lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis//
45a1: ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang do// /
45a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sna chen po la btogs pa 'od ldan gang thos pas kyang sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad
45a3: do/ / de nas gyang sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge
45a4: slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ / 'od ldan da sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to// bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang / ji ltar sdig can
45a5: gyi gyad rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do/ / 'od ldan gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na de bzhin du ngas khyod la gnang ngo // de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/
45a6: stan las langs te chas nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sdigacan gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag re shig sdod cig bdag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs
45a7: tshad gsol nas/ de'i 'og du khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
45a8: spyan drangs zin pas kho bo cag mi nyan to/ / des smras pa/ ji ste mi tub na bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo// de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa// mi gnang ngo // dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa// shes
45b1: ldan dag 'di dad pa med pa zhig las/ 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon bdag 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo // de nas des g.yos mkhan dag skrag ste sgo ba/ shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar
45b2: gyis bca' ba gcig pu gang kho nas 'drangs par 'gyur ba de lta bur sta gon gyis shig/ des dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa re res re re
45b3: 'drangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin pa dag byas so/ / de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// zhes bya ba'i bar
45b4: gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma spyad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o//
45b5: dge slong rnams kyis sdig can rnams kyis gyang rnams la bltas pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag cag bslus lags kyis bzhes shig/ de nas gyad sna chen po las gtogs pa
45b6: 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang de kho nas dge slong rnams 'drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de/ gshegs pas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to// nyi ma gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bsod
45b7: snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur spyon/ chos tshur spyon/ dge 'dun tshur spyon/ 'di dag snoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci kho
45b8: bo la sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes smra na bdag gis mi bya'o// 'on te bdag cag gi sangs
46a1: rgyas ni khyod nyid lags so/ / zhes sman blang bar byaste// 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de bzhin du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes brjod par bya zhid / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang /
46a2: yin pa de la 'am zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge sbyong gi dge 'dun pas khang la spyan drangs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sa ri zhes bya ba
46a3: gzhon nu thor bu lang tshod ral bab cing rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma ldon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung du byin pa dang / ga
46a4: gis mad du byin pa dang / gang gis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs kyis/ ma
46a5: la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gshag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na shing rul ba zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul sdug pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang / de dug gi shugs kyis btul nas sa la 'gyel
46a6: te dbu bar skyug cing bzhin yang gyur/ mig kyang gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi'o// de dag
46a7: gis smras pa/ / dge sbyong shAkya'i sras mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na nye du rnams kyis 'di dpyad byas pa zhig ces bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
46a8: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa la dris la dpyad phyogag/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs te dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
46b1: 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sman pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dag gis zas sbyar na ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams kyis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed nyid kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad
46b2: mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa kho na nyid yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni lci ba dang / gcin dang / thal ba dang /
46b3: sa'o// de la lci ba ni byung nas rin po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o// gcin yang de dag kho na'o// thal ba ni shing lnga po kan tsa na'i dang / ka bi d+hA ka'i dang / a shwa tha'i dang / u dum pa ra'i dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o// sa ni sa las sor bzhi'i 'og nas byung
46b4: ba'o/ / 'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yin no// de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ri la zas sbyar ba byin na/ 'on kyang sos pa ma gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
46b5: pa/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ dge slong sa ri la srung ba dang / yongs su skyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gsang pa
46b6: dang / / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol gnyen te bgyi'o// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
46b7: tshe rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mdag l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gan+d+he
46b8: b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man ta b+ha dre/ shI ra b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ ba ra mAr thA sa d+ha ni/ sarba a nar tha pra sha ma ni/ sarba mad ga la bA d+ha ni/ mA na si/ mA na si/ mA hA ma na si/ ats+tsha te/ ad D+ha te/ ang d+yan b+hu te/ mug te/ mo tsan/
47a1: g+ha na/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a mri te/ a ma ra ni/ braSh+pe/ brah+ma swa ra/ swa ra ni/ sU ra ni/ ma nor the/ mug ta/ dzI ban ti/ sa ri'i gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nang thams cad las srungs shig swA tA/
47a2: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen me'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// dge slong
47a3: rnams the tshom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang / gces spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lags so// dge slong
47a4: ngag da ltar 'ba' zhig du ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na rig sngags kyi rgyal po rma bya chen mos phan pa dang gces spras byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs/
47a5: de'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te nyin mo bde legs su gnas/ nub kar bde legs su gnas pa byas te/ mtshan mo bde
47a6: legs su gnas so/ / de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags/ 'dod pa rnams la zhe na/ 'tshums/ brgya la/ myos/ rab tu rmongs/ rab tu brgyal te/ bag med pas nags kyi rma bya chen mo rab tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun
47a7: dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra ba dang / bskyed mos 'tshal nas bskyed mos tshal dang / ri'i ngos la ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las ji tsam na ri'i ser gzhig tu zhugs pa dang / de der yun ring du phyir rgol ba/ dgrar gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba
47a8: rnams kyi rma bya'i snyis bzung ste/ de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang / rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa rnyed nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di kho na yid la byas so// a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mngag l+ye/ hi ra ne/ ti ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dra/
47b1: tsuD+ha dwe/ sa ma nu ta b+ha dra/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+thas twA ni/ ba ra mAr thA sa d+ha ni/ sarba a na tha pra shA ma ni/ sarba mang gA la bA d+ha ni/ mA nas/ mA na saM/ mA hA mA nas/ ana? te/ ad b+hUd te/ ad d+han Tu te/ mug te/ ma tsan/ ma hA na/
47b2: ar dze ber dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ a mA ra Ni/ pra twe/ za rje sI / skAr ne/ s+yAng na ma nor the/ mug te/ dzI ban ti/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs cig swAhA// des ma bya'i ste chang nas thos so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sams
47b3: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya'i rgyal po gsar du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ de ni yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces smras byas so// nga ltar na nam yang de'i rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces smras byas
47b4: so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri la ji tsam pa bde legs su byas par 'gyur ba la gzigs/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi rngaji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA NA sI'i grong
47b5: khyer na sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod do/ / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul gyis zin nas de shi ba dang / sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang
47b6: yin par ni nga nyid yin no/ / de'i tsheda'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge spang sa ri yin no// sman gyi gzhi rdzogs s+ho// / gos kyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang / de bzhin 'tshor ring po dang // dbyar
47b7: par ni rig bya dang / shi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang // tha ma dag ni nad pa yin// sdus pa'i sdom ni// 'tshe byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang // dbyar gyi ras chen gting ba dang // g.yan pa bde gshegs mon dang dang // bal dang sha na zar ma'i ras// sdom la//
47b8: dum bu sa spyod seng ge dang // de bzhin yangs par song ba dang // sems 'phrog drang srongs 'tshe dang // a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang // tshong dpon chung ma rigs skyes dang // sman pa yi ni lung dang ni// rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang // u dam
48a1: par gzhal ba dang / / bskyed dang rgyal rigs bskyed mos tshal// bcom brlag gyad dang bud med sbrul// ya mun dang dur khrod dang // yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med// rgyal po'i khab bdun bzhi lnga dang // 'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin//
48a2: lus 'phags na rgyal ba 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / le legs pa/ skye ba dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa las blon po'i mchog dum
48a3: bus chos dang 'thun par rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do// des na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor bltas shing 'dug go// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs ste/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
48a4: bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed de de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa cig tu zhes bya ba nas/ sa skyong zhes bya bar brtags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
48a5: bzhin du'o/ / de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de ni seng ge zhes bya bar btags so// sa skyong dang seng ge rims kyis gzhon nur gyur pa na yang blon po'i
48a6: mchog du dum bu ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa gnas lnga la byed pa yin te/ des na blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe/ lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go// de nas
48a7: blon po de rnams ni zil gyis non pas mi bzod pa skyes nas phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal po'i drung du deng do/ / de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smos pa// lha rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gis brtag tu ci yod/
48a8: rgyal po lta nga yin mod/ gzhan su zhig yin/ do rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po ni dum bu lags kyis lha ma lags so// gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las byung nA nying gcod pani bcings te/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la
48b1: dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal pos bsams pa/ des 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas des na dbyen byed do// snyam mo// re shig dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug
48b2: pa dang / blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te/ rgyal ba'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir byung ba de'i tshe yang rgyal po'i pho brang
48b3: de stong par 'dug go/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gang gi slad du snyan du gsol ba spyan sngar bab lags mod// gal
48b4: te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po rnams khra ltar khum brig za ba yin pas des bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad smras
48b5: pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o snyam nas de de la glan ka tshol bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten na mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bar ma yod pas ji tsam na gzhan dag gis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gis thabs legs par
48b6: soms shig/ de rtog pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa gang du 'gro/ gal te mnyan yod du song na ni mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i mnga' ris yin pas nyen 'di nyid yod do// de bzhin du bA rA Na sI dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa yang gcig/
48b7: gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di nyid yod do// yangs pa can ni tshogs kyi dbang yin te/ bcu dga' ba gang yin pa de la ni nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas ye yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas des yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la bdag ni khyed
48b8: cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dug par 'dod do zhes po nya btang ngo / / de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis lan spring ba/ yangs pa can 'dir byon pa legs kyis skyon cig/ de nas blon po'i mchog tu ma bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag
49a1: ni yangs pa can du chas kyis khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba de dag ni 'dug shig/ gang dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni sta gon gyis shig dang 'dod do// ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed cag gis ba lang dang ma he yangs
49a2: pa can gangan der skyongs shig/ shi shes 'tshab rnams la bsgob yangs pa can du 'do gas go gyon cig/ de nas skye ba chags de ltar sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal ngo'i drung dus de stenang pe gnyis la gzugs te smrab pa/ lha ba gyi bcung zhig zim
49a3: te/ skyed mas tshal du mchin gzigs su gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin byas song shig/ des bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/ sted bza' ba dang bca' bas g.yogs nas song ngo // blon pa rnabs kyis
49a4: dum bu bros so zhes thos nas/ de rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha dum bu ni thos so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ded la slar khrag shig/ de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas bsnyags te smras pa
49a5: dum bu ltas bka' stsal gyis slar log shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'o dum bu shi 'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshegs chung ngus grub kyis deng shig/ kho bo ni zos pa yin no// de rnams kyis
49a6: rgyal ba'i sems srung ba'i phyir mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas lag te rgyal po la smras pa/ lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni zos so// rgyal po ma legs so snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// dum bu yang rims kyis yangs pa can du byin
49a7: to/ / de'i tshe yangs pa can ris gsum du gnas te/ ris dang po na ni khang pa rtseg ma bdun stong pa gam ga ser las byas pa'o// ris par ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma khri bzhi stong pa gam dngul las byas pa'o// ris tha ma ni khang pa rtseg ma nyi khri chig stong pa gam zangs la
49a8: byas pa ste/ de rnams na mi dam pa dang / bar ma dang / phal ba rnams ci rigs par gnas so// yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis khrims su bcas te bzhag pa ni ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi bar mngam
49b1: yin/ tha bar ma yin no/ bar ma gang yin pa de ni ris dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do// tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris gsum char du gtod par byed do// bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma btogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing mi 'byin to//
49b2: bud med rin po che ni su la yang me gtong bar tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyad pa kho nar byed do// dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te ris dang por khang pa byin nas de na gnas par brtsams pa las gang gi tshe tshogs su 'dus pa de'i tshe de bos
49b3: kyang 'dur ma btub nas/ de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu khyod ci'i phyir mi 'du/ des smras pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o// yangs pa can pa rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu
49b4: 'dras shig/ 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / des 'dra bar brtsams nas/ blo gros mkhyen na// de rnams kyis smras pa/ dum thu blo gros byin cig/ des smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag ma nyis dmigs byung bas na tho zas ni mi sbyin no//
49b5: de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / de tshogs dang ldan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin no// sngon yangs pa can gyi litsa byi rnams kyis gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na nub po dang bcas par
49b6: gi spring bar byed do/ / gang gi tshe dram bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe/ 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do// gang dag la 'dam po dang bcas par yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na yangs paca
49b7: kye tshogs sngon rngub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po dang bcas par gyur pa la glu ci zhig yod// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyad par yod de lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po mchog dum bu derang 'ongs nas/ de dag ro'i bro zos
49b8: bzhin byed de/ des na da ltar 'dam po dang bcas par smid par byed do// dum bums skyong dang sa ngag khyim thub nas sa ngag rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dka' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhag bcas te/ de'i btsas ston tu cher byas nas
50a1: gos can zhes bya bar btags so/ / de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas khye'u zhig btsas par 'gyur te// des pha srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan to// de yang rtse bar byed
50a2: dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos can zhes bya bar btags so// de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung
50a3: bstan to/ / sa skyong gdug pa rtsa lo che ba zhig pas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi sgyid mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang / bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis spras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis
50a4: de dag gi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma byed shig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/
50a5: lid tsa byi 'di dag rnams gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas 'di la gnod par byas su 'ong gis 'di slar zlog shig/ des de bkug nas smras pa/ bu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug brtsal po che yin gyis 'di dag gi bskyed mos tshal ma rung bar
50a6: ma bya shig/ de dag gis gnod par byas sa re/ des smras pa/ yab 'di dag la ni bskyed mos tshal mchis na bdag cag la ni ma mchis so// des smras pa/ bu bskyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo// des tshogs la gsol ba gdab pa/
50a7: shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis bdag la skyed mos tshal cig/ thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigs so// de rnams kyis de dag la bskyed mos tshal rnying ba zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sa la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gi/
50a8: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs bstan byed du bcug go// gcig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so// de bzhin du gnas bstan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can nas skyong dang seng ge'i shing sa la'i tshal na bzhug/
50b1: so zhes brjod do// sa skyong gis bya ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas li tsa b+hi rnams spyod par byed/ gzhog 'byas byed/ kha zer bar byed/ de nas du ma thas kug ste sgo ba/ bu khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par ri 'or rtsege mo zhig tu song la de rang gi zhing
50b2: las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug shig/ de der song nas rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed par bsdams so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhag na yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas de rnams kyi blon po'i mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa
50b3: las nges kyang dus thung ngu zhig du chos dang 'thun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o/ / yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang / de na kha cig gis spras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum zas tshogs yongs su sbyangs pas na
50b4: de nyid kyi bu gzhug gi/ kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa skyong ni bdug pa rtsal po che zhig ste/ gal te sde dpon du bcug na gdon mi za bar tshogs che bar 'gyuro// de'i nu bo song ge gang yini pa de ni des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed
50b5: nun pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod na de sde dpon du gzhug go// thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no// des smras pa/ sa skyong ni bdag gi bu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug shig/ de rnams
50b6: kyis smras pa/ seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs rgyud kyis rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci tshogs gang la 'drang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cog gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag
50b7: gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na de ni ma 'os pas ya bkur ro snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis
50b8: bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar byed pa las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhes 'dri bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ri 'or nas myong rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal
51a1: ta byed pa'i ri bor ba gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste thags nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyi tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ da ni seng ge
51a2: la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ ci kho bo'i pha shi 'am/ de rnams kyis smras pashi'o// de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ bu po de 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba cig rigs sam/ seng ge ji ltar
51a3: gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/ bdag la yangs pa can pa rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas kyis rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la
51a4: bdag lha'i brtsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo/ / zhes pho nya btang ngo // de de la spring ba 'ong ba legs kyis shog shig ces spring ngo // de rgyal po'i khab du 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/ ji tsam dus
51a5: gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de/ / sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa des skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de thugs mi bgyis shing bzhugs/ des
51a6: smras pa/ de'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ lha thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni ra/ gums pa'i bu zhig ban+da
51a7: bar 'gyur/ gcig shos la ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa na lha'i byengad du dgang khrid de mche/ ba mtshan phun su mtshogs pa bca' bar 'gyur bzhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa 'o// de nas sa skyong gis
51a8: se ge la sbeng ba rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas khyod kyi nyigs can tshur sle shog dang btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro/ / das des la yaM ge lan sbeng ba/ gang bskor kyang khyed kho na la bdag 'dra bar zad de/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa
51b1: de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so/ / ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtong ngo // sa bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te sbed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bas de bskyed mos tshal tu
51b2: gyung ba dang khyod kyis khrid de song zhig/ de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la ma chi phyag byas nas shing ltar zhugs te yangs pa can du song ba las rim gyis phyin nas bskyed mos tshal du bsdad do// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srungs shig shi nas me ma yin pa
51b3: rnams su skyes pa des yangs pa can pa rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la mgul ba la dril sbyongs shig dang gal te yadra pa tsa rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na bdag gis ji tsam
51b4: du zin pa 'am/ 'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul ba la dri la btags te/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang
51b5: gzhag go/ sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba/ kho bo bskyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung zhig dang / des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la btags nas khyim du song ste nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thogs/
51b6: la bskyed mo tshal du byung shig/ des rgyan rnams thogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan thogs/ kho mo bag mar btang ngo // su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o// des smras pa/
51b7: kho mo phu mo yin na khyod ci ste bag mar btang / gal te de lta na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs rong rong por gyur nas// bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so// seng ge sngabs
51b8: pas nye gos can yin no/ / snyam nas gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang spangs pas gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyags nas/ de dang de rnams su lhan cig 'thab par rnams
52a1: pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun zin gyis lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar de shig/
52a2: de rnams kyis smras pa/ ded cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do// go phung cig de rnams kyis go phur pa dang lnga bzlas la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam nas skra
52a3: ste bros so/ / yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi sgra 'di la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan glon du bzhug gis/ gleglags bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skyegs la rgyas te ba
52a4: nas gzhag go zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas gzhag go/ / sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin nas smras pa/ nyes gos can bobs shig/ des smras pa/ khu gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags so// /
52a5: khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ sa skyong 'ongs sam/ 'ongs pa legs so// lha bdag mchis lags so//
52a6: nyes gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so// ci zhig zer/ nyes gos can lags snyam nas gos can khrid de mchis so// bltas khrid de shog shig/ de nang du khrid pa dang rgyal pos lhag
52a7: bar gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te ngal
52a8: ba yod par gyur na de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o/ / de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar
52b1: byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgung spyod par byed do// ngazhi gdus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dwags kyi phyir byung ba na ba sti gnas shigan drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// ji tsam na ri dgas
52b2: yada'i long la btags pas skrag bzhig drang srong de'i sdiganas sa zhugs shing 'byung brgyal ba'i mangs gnang du bstan to/ / de nas drang srong de kris nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bste gnas gcan pan gdug pas kyang gses par
52b3: zla bar ri dgas skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsod dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de sad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'di sal g.yar mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin na/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la btsas
52b4: zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so// gal te de ltan ngas drang srong 'di yongs su spangs so// de gsad par brtsams te gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis 'dag
52b5: shes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par bskri sa/ gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu smras pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa/ shin du bcas pa yin pas gal te gzhan du skyeb
52b6: blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so// de smon lam log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so// gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la nyid
52b7: mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la khrag gi char bab po/ / gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha gcad cing gcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug
52b8: nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so// rgyal po sems khongs su chud cing 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas
53a1: pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar sur shas bltam pas bgyis te gsol la nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas bdag nyid gos can
53a2: la btabs pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ skye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i de yang rgyal po la smras pa
53a3: dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag blud pas de 'dod pa'i de dang bral bar gyur to// ji tsam na zla dgu 'tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs pazang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// btsas te gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi
53a4: nyi ma la yang khrag gi chang bab po/ / rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gyur pa ltar na/ gdon mi tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku tshe dang bral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid
53a5: bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal pos bsams pa// rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi phyed du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin ni ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo// de'i tshe yangs pa can na ling tsa byi ming chen zhes bya ba
53a6: zhig gnas te/ de'i skyed mos tshal na a mI tshal yod pa las der blo bung du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga'i rab srungs pas mthong ngo // de ma thag kho na me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan rnams
53a7: bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de srung du gsol cig dang dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/
53a8: bskyed mos tshal der kun nas bsrungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas nyi ma 'grang ba la zhugs so// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / bskyed mo tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams gsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim
53b1: pa'i pog por dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig
53b2: byung nas bskyed mos tshal de na de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chu shing gi sdong po gus nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de nas ming chen gyis chung
53b3: mdam pa la gtad pa dang / des spras pa/ lnga 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas 'di'i ming a mra sgying ma zhes bya'o// di tsam na khyim bdag ming chen bskyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim
53b4: du song ste bu mo amra skyong ma bskyed pa srings te zhes bya ba nas chen por gyur te zhes bya bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de spyod pa'i phyir yul krung krung ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i bu
53b5: dang / tshong ba dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa gang kho na la mabyin pa de dag kho na sdang bar 'gyur na 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pas re shig tshogs la brtag go// snyam nas/
53b6: des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis bskyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de bdag gis bsnun bsnyod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs rgyud dang 'tsham par 'ga' zhib
53b7: la chung mar byin na tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni mi btad te tshogs kyis skyed do// zhes bcas pa yin gyis re shig bu mo de ci 'dra ba zhig bltas khrid de shog
53b8: shig/ des de tshogs kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig dgrad de kun tu brtags par brtsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che
54a1: yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis su la yang mi sbyin no/ / de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci
54a2: slad duthugs med dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud mod rin po che yin no zhes tshogs kyis spyad par gyur te bdag gi yid la reb ma rdzogs so// yab ci khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu mo sngon tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad
54a3: ro zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do// des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste gal te bdag la tshogs kyi dam pa lnga zhig skul na/ bdag tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa stsal ba dang / skyes
54a4: pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kar sha ba na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim thul ba de'i tshe/ bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang // bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir
54a5: 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o// ming chen gyis a ma skyong ma'i spring ba bzlas pa dang tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas te/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la ris dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po che 'di kho na la 'os so//
54a6: gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du mi zhugs par bya'o zhes gang smra ba de yang bden te/ sha'on rnams las ni 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha kho na tha chad pa yin pas gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos kyang nang du zhugs na
54a7: gdon ma zos par gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro/ / nang du 'jug pa des kar sha pA Ni lnga brgya thogs te nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du bgos so// zhag bdun lon pa na khang pa
54a8: thul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sngar ram byis byas kyang rung de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad tshong ma yin pas gal te mi rnam
54b1: kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa brtags na su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to// yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis dga' mgur spyod pa'i phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa
54b2: las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags med pa'i phyir mthong ma thag kho nas 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to// kha gcig gis ni reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so// des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis thabs shig
54b3: bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang na rgyal po 'am thon po 'am/ phyug po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong ba'am// ded dpon ci 'dra ba mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig
54b4: pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags te dris pa// shes ldan dag 'di gang zhig 'di ni rgyal po rab gnang ngo // gzhana'i dgang
54b5: zhig/ kos sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed do// gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma g+ha d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o// des de bzhin du dris pa dang de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so//
54b6: denas des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas des bsams pa/ skyes bu 'di ltar chu zheng gab pas ni bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par nus so snyam mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ma gan+d+ha'i rgyal po
54b7: bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad tshong ma ji lta bu mthong / sa skyong gis smras pa/ lha re zhig
54b8: gzhan lta zhog/ yangs pa can na smad tshed ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa sgyu brtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so// des smras pa/ sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa
55a1: can du 'dod/ de dang lhan gcig dga' mgur spyad do// des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa slar rgal ba dgra bo lags pas khyod la gnod pa bgyid du mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa
55a2: shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpa' snying can yin pas 'dod do/ / des smras pa// lta gal te don ma mchis pa la gtsigs che bar mdzad na gshegs mod/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis
55a3: yangs pa can du phyin nas sa skyong ni bskyed mos tshal na sdod do/ / rgyal po ni a mra skyod ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byi rnams rong rong por gyur nas shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig
55a4: nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos a mra skyod ma la dris pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum pa nyul bar bgyid do// ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i slad du'o// ji ltar bya/
55a5: ci 'bros sam/ lha mi bgyis pa ma mdzad cig/ lha dgung bdun lon pa dang bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas re shig dgung bdun du rol pas bgyis par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod la dgu bdun lags dang dus mkhyen par bgyi'o// de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
55a6: bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/ lha bdag la sems can zhugs so// des de la ser ras shig dang sor gdub brgya byin nas smras pa/
55a7: gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no// 'on te khye'u yin na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub gyi rgyu mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du sgri shig/ de byung ste shing rtang zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang dril bu'i 'khrol bar 'dug go/ de rnams kyis
55a8: smras pa/ shes ldan dag dgra bo byung gis rjes bzhin du btsal lo zhes li tsa byi dkyil 'khor gyi mnga' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying pa'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang / sa skyong gis mthong nas des smras pa/ lha yangs pa can gyi la
55b1: tsa byi rnams mchin/ lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi 'am/ 'on te shing rta brdab/ des smras pa/ da ni dub pas shing rta ded kyis khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo khye shig/ des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa
55b2: las yangs pa can rnams kyis do shes nas de rnams kyi smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis slar log go/ de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te 'dus nas yang khrims su bcas pa/ shes ldan dag pa dag cag gi sku
55b3: 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon du gzhug go zhes bcas so/ / ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang a mra skyod ma la khye'u gzugs bzang la mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas zhes byas pa nas bsrings bskyed de
55b4: chen por gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / de yangs pa can po'i li tsa byi'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ bran me'i bu khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na pha su yin/ des ngus nas
55b5: ma'i drung du song ba dang des smras pa/ bu ci'i phyir ru du/ des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu gal te yang 'dra dang de'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag cig la yang med do zhes smros shig/ gal te su yin zhes sgra dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no zhes smos shig
55b6: ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do// su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag
55b7: ga cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag par yang brdegs so/ / des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di gsad par
55b8: 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/ / snyam mo// de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang tshod pa rab tu mang po zor thogs nas rgyal po'i khab du 'dong pa de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgyal 'dis snod rgyas thob la ded shig dang shog gam mi gcod
56a1: par 'gyur ro/ / khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la sor gdub kyi rgya 'di 'di'i mgul du thogs te rgyal po'i khab du zhog shig/ de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// bu la yang mu tig gi do shol cig byin
56a2: nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te phang du 'dug shig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smra dang / de la yang bu pas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam
56a3: zhes smros shig/ de tshong ba rnams dang lhan cig du rim gyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te sor gdub gyi rgya btags nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gzhag pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang
56a4: la bzhag nas 'dzegs te phang du 'dug go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go// des smras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun tu smras pas/
56a5: rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// / 'dul ba gzhi// bam po drug bcu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag par chags pas glang po
56a6: che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs so// shes bya ba nas dpa'
56a7: mgur spyod par byed do/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de zod thogs te/ yul gyi mthar song ngo //
56a8: de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro// de nas
56b1: rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog des smras pa/ lha g.yar tshalags kyis khyod nyid nang du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ de yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang //
56b2: ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de na rgyal po'i de la yang so gdub kyi da pe ga po byin nas smras pa/ gal te re shig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub kyi rgyu yang
56b3: mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du sgri shig/ 'on te bu mo yin na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no// zhes smras nas rgyal po song ngo // ji tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste rgyal po'i kha ba dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/
56b4: kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/ zhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo // spring ba des thos nas bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du phongs par gyur nas des de ltar gyur pa rnams
56b5: rgyal po la reg par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar spring ba/ bag mtsha bar bdug shig/ ci nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar ngas byas so// rgyal pos de la pho nya btang gi/ ded dpon nga la rin po che che ge mo dang che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis
56b6: de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ong shig/ de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo // de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// ma brlabs kyang bud med la shes nyen
56b7: yod pas der mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bskor na song gdu kyi rgya 'gul du btags te ser ras kyis bkris nas sbom bu'i nang du bcug ste bu mo mdag gzhug ma la sgo ba/ song la sbom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyi dkyil
56b8: 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar tu sdod cig/ des de bzhin du byas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas rgyal po gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dug pa las/
57a1: des rgyal po'i pho zung gi skon mar ma mthong ngo // de nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la skyob/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho zang gi sgron mar me 'bar bya 'on ci yin ltos shig/ de dag gis bzlas nas smras pa/ lha sbom pa
57a2: zhig mchis so/ / des smras pa/ long shig/ rgyal bugazhon nu 'jigs med gyis spras pa/ lha skom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la sprul bar ci gnang / rgyal pos de bzhin bya'o zhes khas blangs so// ji tsam na sbom bu'o na blangs nas
57a3: rgyal po la phul ba dang rgyal pos spras pa/ kha phye shig/ kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo // rgyal pos spras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on teshi bzhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lags so// de nas rgyal pos sor gdu
57a4: b+hadang mang ngas dogs nas rgya'abrigazhin nu 'dogs med la byin pa dang / des bdun pa rjod paskyed de rgyal pos gsonanas nis cig du byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzhin nu 'jigs med kyis gsas pas/ ba byed gagon nas gsas
57a5: zhes bya bar grags so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed gzhon nu gsos chen por gyur to// de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes sgra ni ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du
57a6: lung bstan gyis bdag cag gis bzo ba cung zad bslabs te/ des na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yod
57a7: su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu 'jigs med gzhon nus mthong nas/ des rgyal po'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'dis zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lags so// 'dis ci 'thob/ 'tsho'o//
57a8: des bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la btags nas shing rtam pan bslab po snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab po// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod 'dis 'tshe bar 'gyur ram// yab rgyal
57b1: bo'i bus ni bzo thams cad la slab par bgyi ba lags so/ / bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs shig/ des bslab par brtsams so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs
57b2: su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/ des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so// 'di ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do// ci thob/ gal te nang ba zhig sos na rngan pa
57b3: thob bo/ / 'on te gum na mi 'tshel mi 'dri'o// des bsams pa/ sman spyad ba slab po snyam nas/ de pha'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig/ sman dpyid bslab lags so// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no// khyod la sman
57b4: dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na slobs shig/ des sman dbyung bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad ni lobs na des klang pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma
57b5: shes nas/ des rje 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de// de grad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'dzag mchi'o// ci zhig gi phyir de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun
57b6: shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de glad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bas de slob du mchi'o// bu khyod 'dis 'tsho'am/ lha yang na ne dpyad mi slab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o// bu gal te da ltan so shig/ des rgyal
57b7: po pad ma'i snying po la spring pa/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/ 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rdo 'jog du phyin pa dang / pad ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig glags
57b8: rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyis 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig/ rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis khyad par dang bcas pa longs
58a1: so/ / rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe nad pa'i ltar 'gro ba'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig khri dang 'gro ba yin pas de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas des nad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag ni byin cig ces smras
58a2: nas byung ngo / / 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/ gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni legs pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bya'o snyam nas de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung
58a3: nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo // kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma sbyin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces zer ro// des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur to// ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu
58a4: yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ na ba ji ltar sos par gyur to// sang yang de nyid byin cig/ ci snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci bdag gis sngar bstan tam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni khyod
58a5: kyis mngon sum du bstan to/ / 'di ni 'tsho byed la 'phrin du spring ba yin no// des bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no// snyam bsams nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig/ rgyun shes kyi bu
58a6: byed la dga' ba skyes pas de gang du 'gro bar der 'tsho byed khrid do/ / bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni spro bas ston par mdzad kyi/ dag cag la ni mi mdzad do// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed
58a7: ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te da lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o// des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la khyod
58a8: kyis ni rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig/ khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes thams cad tshod dus su gtad do// 'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o// bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas so// 'tshe byed/
58b1: kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsams pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin dri'o snyam mo// de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song
58b2: nas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin smras so/ / rgyun shes kyi bus ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri bar brtsams te/ bram ze'i khye'u rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to// gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa ma 'tshal lags so// /
58b3: 'tsho byed la dris pa dang des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag byed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so// des na 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te/ cung zad bstan na yang de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus
58b4: so zhes smras pa ni don de yin no/ / gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o// zhes de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la de la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog shig/ de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de de
58b5: dag gis blangs so/ / 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blangs so// ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang /
58b6: phrum tshung khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las/ de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro/ des smras pa/ des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur
58b7: to/ / de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum chung 'di khyod snoms shig/ des phrum tshung blangs te/ zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas de phrum tshud khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i
58b8: rjes zhig mthong nam/ de rnams kyis de la btag par brtsams pa dang 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i rjes so// 'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyi/ 'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa
59a1: gang ba ba na gang patsho'i phyag gu 'byung bar 'gyur bzhag sanal/ de la zhan pa ni zad mad maN+Dal/ dmang rdzog g.yas bzha ba sdus par da nyid du tham maca ba nga shAng bzhan pa u0f7f/ dza6 dz+nyArnan d+ha/
59a2: drung du 'ongs pa nas gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to// rgyun gas kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re shig 'don cheg mo zhig gis dang cheg mo nig yin la/ de bzhin du gzhan meng gzhan dan
59a3: kyang yin no/ / 'tsho byed la dris pa/ khyod kyis ci khyer de 'angs/ des smras pa/ mkhan po thams cad sman lags so// sman ma lags pa ni ci yang ma mchis so// 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mnga' d+hA'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang /
59a4: phrum tshung gcig 'tshal de mchis so// 'di dag ci dgos sdig pas zin pa las 'dam bu 'da' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go// phrum tshud kyis ni klan par bgyi'o// rdo'i dum bus ni ston kha'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chag par 'gyur ro//
59a5: rgyun shes kyi bus 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u dag rnams kyis bsams pa/ mkhan po ni 'di la khros so snyam nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po 'di cig brang bas snyam 'am/ bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong
59a6: ban 'di'i mchid nas 'dzin pa lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring kho nar glang po che phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sdum pa de ring nyid du bu po btsal
59a7: bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ / rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/ 'tshe byed bden nam/ mkhan po med do// de glang po che'i rjes sam/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na ci
59a8: te ma 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo/ ba glang mo'i rjes ni chung ring ngo // mig g.yas pa zhang bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa las so// sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba las so// deng kho nar 'brang
59b1: bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin be'u stabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so// glang bca'i dug gu zong 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchi bas so// de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rka
59b2: pa'i bar du gcis pa las so/ / de yang mag g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog thu zhing mchi bas so// de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so// deng kho nar btsas par
59b3: 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ldan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba las so// de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na 'dron po gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mdag du gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba
59b4: dang / 'tsha byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ 'tshe byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can no// 'tsho byed kyis glang ba'i thod pa 'byed pa'i/
59b5: dpyad ma btogs pa thams cad skabs so// ji tsam na mi zhig glang nad kyis thebs nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bu bdag la spyad mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje re shig de ring dor skos la lci ba dag ste/
59b6: gon gyis shig dang sang bdag gis khyod kyi spang bya'o// 'tshe byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin na/ bdag gis glad pa'i
59b7: thod pa'i dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dben par zhog shig dang / khyed kyi las ji ltar byed pa lta'o// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// des de phyogs dben pa zhig tu gzhag go/ de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de
59b8: dong du bcug ste thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas de skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa mkhan po gzu lums su ma blangs shig/ rigs kyi bu 'di deng nyid 'gum par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ 'tsho byed
60a1: 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan po bdag mchis so// kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzod de rgyab du reg nas rkang lag khums par gyur pa dang de nas 'or cig/
60a2: des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed kho bo shin du mgu bar gyur gyis khyod khrus byos la shog shig dang glad pa'i thod la 'byed pa'i dpyad sbyin no// des khrus byas nas/ 'ongs
60a3: pa dang / des de la klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad sbyin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyis/ yul 'dir khyod kyis ma bya zhig/ mkhan po de bzhin bgyi'o zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas
60a4: nas rgyal po pad mi'i snying po'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas/ bdag gis sman dpyad bslabs lags kyis mchi'o// de'i tshe rgyal po pad ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob pa'i skyabs seng zhes bya ba
60a5: dag cig yod do/ / des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi 'thun pa mtha' 'khob pa skyabaseng zhes bye ba dag cig yod kyis 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas re shig de pho ba la phyis song shig dang / de lta na bdag cag gis
60a6: 'jig rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro/ / des de la khas blangs pa dang de nas deso pung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las des mtha' 'khob pa skya ba sed de rnams phab nas gte'u bzung dpya blangs te slar bde
60a7: bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' nas de nyid la rjes su yi rang nas des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la byin no// de nas 'tsha byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas de nyid du dbyar gnas te/
60a8: de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang / mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang spags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsha
60b1: byed kyis mthong nas de la smras pa/ kye nang rje ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur to// de shing
60b2: brtag pa la byang ba yin pas/ smras pa/ kye nang rje ci shing khur 'di tshong dam/ 'tshong ro// rin ji tsam/ kar sha ba Na lnga brgya'o// des de nyos nas de nas bltas nas 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas de'i mthun 'di
60b3: 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nang pa'i mdun du gzhag pa de'i tshe mar me khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du nang ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo // de rim gyis yul u dum 'ba' rar phyin pa dang / de na me bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bos gzhal nas bre mgo la snun pa 'tsha
60b4: byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir de ltar byed/ bdag gi glang pa lhag par g.yo'o// tshur shog blta'o zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du
60b5: gzhag pa dang / ji tsam na srin gyi me cig snang ngo // de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyis glad pa la srin gyi me yod do// des rkang pa gnyis la btugs te smras pa/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig/ des khas blangs so// 'tsho byed kyis bsams
60b6: pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du 'di'i dpyad bya'o snyam nas/ des nga la smras pa/ kye nang rje re shig de ring dong rkos la lci bdag sta gon byos shig dang sar dpyad bya'o// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo // 'tshe byed kyis de'i
60b7: gyi de nyin 'ongs nas de dong du bcug ste glad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad kyis klang pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tshabs srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg pa byas ste des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor bas sos par gyur to// des
60b8: de la kar sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bkur ro/ / de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / yul ro ti ta ka na khyim bdag cig la bskyed mos 'tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zheg sod
61a1: de la lhag par chags pa las shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin rnams su skyes so/ / de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas des snyed mos tshal der srungs ma'i mi gzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do// gnyis pa gzhag pa dang /
61a2: de yang bsad nas khyim bdag gi bu des bskyed mos tshal de bor ro// ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig bskyed mos tshal der song nas nub mo 'brang btab te 'dug nas/ kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ci
61a3: ma rung snyam mo/ / de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo 'brang btab te 'dug go/ ji tsam na mi ma yin pa des dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i nang de byung nas smras pa/ 'di dag gis sngar bzung na ci'i phyir 'di bsdigs/ khyod
61a4: la ra spu'i rung bas bdug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ das ni khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// des kyang smras pa/ khyod la yang la bug gi sa bon mang phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te/ sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lnga/ des ni khyod
61a5: dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad mtsho byed kyis thos nas de nad par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ khyim bdag skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sun tshogs pa ci'i phyir drong / khyin
61a6: bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag ra spu'i dud pas dugs shig/ mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gis ra spu'i dud pas bdugs pa dang / mi ma yin pa de
61a7: dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par gyur to/ / khyim bdag des kyang mtshe byed la kar sha ba Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tshe byed kyis dmu rku can la dris pa/ nang rje khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gan+da
61a8: btab pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug/ des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang / 'tshe byed kyis smras pa/ la bug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thung shig dang / sos par 'gyur ro// des thungs nas/ sos par 'gyur te//
61b1: ma des kyang 'tshe bing la kar sha ba Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom pa rlag du phyin nas bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung dra ngal so zhing 'dug go// ji tsaman kyang gyis kyang cig
61b2: brdabs pas de'i na dgrel rnams 'khrugs nas dashi'o/ / zhes phyi rol du byung ngo // shing de la yang bya rgod mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig 'dug pa las del byu gud rnams kyis smras pa/ ma sha byin cig/ des smras pa/ pra shwag la yod/
61b3: de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gyad kyis kyang 'di brdabs te shi nas phyung ba yin no// bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po mtshe byad 'ongs nas des 'di sos par byed pa'i gnas de yod do// ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas reg par
61b4: byas na'o/ / dathams cad 'tshe byad kyis zos so// de nas de langs to ro'i drung du song nas dris pa shes ldan dag 'di ni zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gyad kyis kyang bsngabs pra shi ba yin no// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog shig dang blta'o// de rnams
61b5: kyis gzhag pa dang nas 'tshe byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dad bar byed pa'i nong bu sa dpar gzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nad krol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas des smug ma'i skabs su phye mthugs te khas bus pa dang b+ha mas nang grom
61b6: rnams la reg nas sos par gyur to/ / des kyang 'tshe byed la kAr sha ba Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang de rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// bcom padrug na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung mi gzugs dang ling tshe pur sna mtshags pa yin pas der la
61b7: lhag pu chags shing 'dug pa las shi nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin byar skyes par gyur te/ de gung dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa de shi bar byed do// de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed do// des sman pa 'tshe byed de 'o
61b8: sa zhes thos nas de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tshe byed bdag la bron do mchis kyis dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tshe byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas sbas pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad
62a1: palta na dpyad bya'o/ / des smras pa/ g.yar tsha lags so// de smras pa/ khyod kyis dpyad gzhan ni med do// bdag las phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so// de nas des sgren mor byung ste// bzo bcos
62a2: byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/ / de nas srin bu de de la chags pa dang des de blangs nas bor te sos par gyur te// de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pas dang / de rna ba gnyis
62a3: bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sred mo dang 'dra ste khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do// des kyang de la kar sha ba Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed ram gyis chu'o ya
62a4: mu ni'i 'gram du byin pa dang / des de na mi re zhig yod pa de'i bting ba'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i zed yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa dang 'dzums pa mthong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis thams cad btags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa
62a5: dang long mo la sogs pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug go snyam nas/ de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na gyad kyis gyang gcig thal mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags pa dang / 'tshe byed de'i drung
62a6: du song nas/ des rting pa'i rgyus pa'i bred nas drangs pa dang slar chud par gyur to// des de la kar sha ba Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// yangs pa can ni ma zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/ dor de las
62a7: phrug gu bdun brgya byung bas de rna ba'i nad kyis nyen par gyur nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste spras pa/ dpyad mdzod cig/ 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyis da ni rang gi blos las bya'o snyam
62a8: nas/ des me de la sgo ba/ kye nang rje sor la lo ma'i skyil po byos lte ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste/ sa yang dron por gyis shig/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad byas so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi des
62b1: bsnyal nas sa de chus chag chag btab nas de nas rnga brdungs pa dang srin gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab po snyam nas phyir byung ngo / / de nas 'tsho byed kyis na ba'i drung ngu sha'i dum bu gcig gzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te phru gu rnams
62b2: khrid de byung nas phru gu rnams dang lhan cig sha'i dum bul tshugs pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mong la sha'i dum bu bor ba dang / mi de smos par gyur to// des kAr sha ba Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med k+She mA la byin no// de rim
62b3: gyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tshe byed ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/ des gzhon nu ma skyes dgral bgro ba/ bu khyod kyi bu pho 'ongs kyis sur song zhig/ de sur song ba dang / 'tshe byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes
62b4: dgra rnga ltar sur 'ong ba thos nas des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis des su ba bdag gir byas pa ni nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod par byed par 'gyur ro/ snyam nas/ de slar log ste sgo gzhan zhig nas zhugs so// dus gzhan
62b5: 'gan 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor ste sems g.yeng zhing song ba las/ dzi tsam na bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas batsho byed kyi drung du skyong ste/ bdag la sman ston cig/ tshig pa zos nas smras pa/ thal bas thob
