84a4: re zhig 'tshal ches/ bro na nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na/ lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong
84a5: rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin/ btsun pa de ring kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag bzhug bgyid pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byas pa mthong nas/ de slar mchis te bdag la 'phags pa rnams/
84a6: ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nas phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab bo zhes mche bas de rnams dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyis bkab bar 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig
84a7: thang dag rlung ma rnams la khrus ras sbyi/ btsun padun 'di ga cigan khyim pa mo da mang po dag dge slong marab tumang pa rnams chu bo gnas ldan la srin mor khrus babyed pa la/ sa khyim pa sod rnams kyis pa gang cang bgang nas 'a
84a8: ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi 'doms nye bar ston te/ de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams bag 'khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus ras kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma legs so legs
84b1: so/ / khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rgyad spras pa gang yin pa de dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing 'di dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang
84b2: dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes tshad bzung bar mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas
84b3: gyen du 'dus so/ / btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong tshig mo de snga nas dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas rgyun tu zhugs pa rnam par mi sbyang ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa pang gzhos
84b4: de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyinang dulan bdun du nyid margyams byor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur dgas lung bstan pa thos// de matan yon du sa 'ga'as te 'a slar yangs
84b5: 'gyur la des bdag gi glo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras longs spyod par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba'i bar de thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges pa 'byung ba
84b6: dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig
84b7: 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar bye bas 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan mod du nges 'ga' mchi zhing slar mchil/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos rab chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ngas can bya ba'i b.radago
84b8: ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang babyang rgyan po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun ta skor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba
85a1: 'gyur te 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar mchil/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma gakhrus ras zhes
85a2: bya ba'i bar gor ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong cheg mo dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra
85a3: bcom pa mngon gsum du byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de/ / res 'ga' mnyan yod du mche zhing slar yang mchil/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar
85a4: gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas
85a5: 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzed stong yang dag par rab tu dga' bar 'dzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan
85a6: yod du ji ba tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dra/
85a7: snga dron bza' sham thabs bstabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal migatsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang
85a8: 'dengs par byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgon gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/
85b1: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nasas byas pa gang yin pa de dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms
85b2: spyad de/ zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhos su phab nas zhabs bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dog dra
85b3: ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dir da snga dro sham thabs gos
85b4: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'di dam par byed pa mthong ngo //
85b5: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma rtags par spyod pa byed do// dge
85b6: slong dag dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyod pa dang / dus su spyod pa dang / skabs skabs su spyod pa dang / btags te spyod pa dang / cung zad spyod pa ni legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas
85b7: spyad par bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o// gnas mal mi gtsang bsagos na de'i ma kho na la bkra bar bya ste/
85b8: gzhan dun 'gal chams can du 'gyur ro// do nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs bsnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos brnabs nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las
86a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgya ba nag por gyur pa zhig rgyad ring po kha nas gzigs so/ / gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi n+ya nag po pa pi mthong ngam btsun pa ma
86a2: lags so/ / kun dga' bo ma ma shin yad dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung pa la rab tu 'byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'tshun gyi gnas tshal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / drim can gyi gding ba dang / shung bu da rgya
86a3: dang sdug klu'i gding pas bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tsho bas lnga rgyar rgya ba nag por gyur to/ / da rung yang rgya banag par gyur to zhes rig par mdzad nas langs pa pag sasod snyoms mdzad dashes bya nas na
86a4: yang dag 'dog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bden bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag do rang
86a5: sAsrog mthabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ de nas ngas mi rgya ba nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur
86a6: pa las de na des dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin cad ming tsam gyi gding bad
86a7: dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o/ / longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ stug na ni rim gcig gis so// sed pazhig na ram gnyis kyis so//
86a8: dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkrab 'tshangam sad bdag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed// kha zer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po'am 'damaka
86b1: 'am kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gris dras pa bcad par bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig gcan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag gis reg nas drim zhim la spang ma rnams 'du'i
86b2: de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa des bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
86b3: pa de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ g.yan pa dgab pa bcad par bya ste/ zhag lnga 'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya ste// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong mde'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang khyams dang
86b4: rdzing dang sgo khang dang / bar rim dang / 'chags rnams dang / shing drung gi gnas rnams na dri mi zhim pa dang / spang ma rnams 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyad pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas
86b5: byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong de nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyad pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/
86b6: dge slong mdzin kyis thebs pas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang / ji skad du bsgrags pa'i 'khyams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi cha ba khungs dang / snam byi sar 'jug par mi bya
86b7: ste dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim 'gro bya'o/ / dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
86b8: 'dul ba gzhe bam po drug bcu bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa mon/
87a1: dar gyi chos gos la chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor cing gar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha na'i ras la yang rung ngo // sdom la
87a2: gsom sgra'i chos gos dang / gcer bu skra 'bal lo ma'i gos/ mthang gos can dang g.yang bzhi dang / gsoras seng pa kha tshang sngo// gleng gzhini mnyan yod na'o// dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zham/
87a3: gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
87a4: skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di na mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcad par mi bya'o// bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das
87a5: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag skra'i chos gos bcang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags so zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
87a6: bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gcer bur bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags
87a7: yin no/ / gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod gcer bu byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o// byas ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams
87a8: gyur to/ / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
87b1: bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgar ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang
87b2: khyim thab tshol le zhes yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur te so so nas bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro snyam mo// des ma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi khyim thab tu
87b3: 'gyur ro/ / de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyim thab tu pad mas so// zhes smras pa dang / des 'jug ma bsgrengs nas gar byed par bcams pa de yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byed gzhan dag gis smras
87b4: pa khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab du gyur pas so/ / de smras pa ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi ldan pas 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no// zhes pa rma bya des thos nas yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog
87b5: mdzes pa dang / mdab ma mdom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ nor bu bai dUr+ya dang 'dra gyur na/ ci slad khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi stsal/ yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang / mdab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan 'grin pa ni/
87b6: nor bu bi dU bya dang 'dra gyur kyang / 'dzem med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid de/ de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing
87b7: yid mi bde nas bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo / / da ltar yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
87b8: bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'drag par rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod sgra 'bal skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ sgra 'bal ba 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no// de ltabs na dge slong gi skra 'bal/
88a1: bar mi bya'o 'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti
88a2: mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag blagos mthar gos dang bcas
88a3: pas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tshe bar byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis bla gos mthang gos dang bcas
88a4: pa'i thos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o/ / 'tshe bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag g.yang / zhi 'chang par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
88a5: gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos
88a6: 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
88a7: to/ / btsun pa bdag kha tshar 'chang par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste kha tshar 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis
88a8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chad par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni khyim pa 'chad par byed do// de lta bas na dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcad
88b1: par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de bzhin du thams cad ser ba'am/ thams cad dmar ba 'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// sdom la/ kha tshar ring dang gdengs ka dang // ral ka gtsug
88b2: tor thong dang ni rabal gos dang rngabral gram/ mtshan na kun dga' mtha dgos bcas/ yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
88b3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag 'char
88b4: gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'charang bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong
88b5: zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag ra la ka 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya
88b6: ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes
88b7: bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag zong 'ching bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti
88b8: mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos bcad par 'tshal lo//
89a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
89a2: gsol to btsun pa bdag rngabal gyi blam 'chad par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur re zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dang
89a3: ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te snam sbyar med par de phyi rol du byung ba dang / de'i snam myur rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a4: bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing sngam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o// song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rin nad can na pa de'i/
89a5: nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las/ char bab pa dang de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang blogos su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang snam sbyar bzhag du rung ba ni
89a6: ste/ dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang char bab pa dang / char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o//
89a7: bar sdom gyi tshogs su bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/ byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/ brnyed pa chud dang 'gyod pa dang / dge 'dun rnyed dang / de de'i yin bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsungs na//
89a8: dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i modado kho na la ljongs rgyur dod pa dang de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// ma bcol
89b1: ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o// blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcol ba'i dge
89b2: slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o// dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po dang /
89b3: slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o/ dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par byed pa na rnyed pa chung yin no// snyom nas/ dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sgral ga gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// gzhan dag gis ma bcol bar dong ba
89b4: dang de rnams kyis sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das
89b5: kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blangs ni ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o// ri bo re zhig na
89b6: khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag 'ang zhig brtsegs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na ras yug brgya 'bul lo// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na/ yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o ji tsam dus gzhan
89b7: zhig na gtsug lag khang de nyid du nan zhugs gnyis zhig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug brgya skur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed yan ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// cig shos kyis
89b8: smras pa/ bdag cag kho na yir 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na long shig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun cod par mi 'gyur grang ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar sgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa dge slong rnams/
90a1: zom la de rnapas dang lhan cig paga'o// tsig gas kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byan su 'gro// gang gdon par gos rnams sus bsrung gang gzhon pas so// de ltar mi nus kyis gang gdod pa ni 'gro'o// gang shar ba den
90a2: gos rnams bsrung ngo / / de bzhin dbya'o zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams bong pa'i phyir mnyan yod pa // drug sterna pas kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug de rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal gyi sgor ma ming sos ma spo ba byed pa yid pas
90a3: nyedaga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi sgo na 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na nas ma go smra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin pa 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de sur 'gro'o snyam nas gnas btan byod pa legs
90a4: sa byon pa legs so/ / slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// des bsams pa 'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri 'or che gezhi gnas so// ci de na
90a5: gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin/ de ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro// gal te de ltar na nga kho nas khyod la snying
90a6: brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ / slob dpon legs so// nye dgas bsams pa gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de ngal sor bcug
90a7: ste dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blad nas ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis nam sros kyis bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bska ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do// de nas nye dga' gsar 'phel
90a8: bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tshe ra bas mtshan mo de 'das par bya'o/ / de nas de nang bar sngang langs te/ rgan zhugs de khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i rgan zhugs gcig shos des
90b1: des pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig smras nas de gnyis ral sos pa dang khong gsum char yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa dgos shog/ gnas brtan bgo'o// nyes dgas rgan zhugs cig la sbas pa/
90b2: rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ gnas brtan padag ni mi 'gyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // gcig shos pa 'a dras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis sgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa khyed ni
90b3: nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsams pa rgan zhugs pa 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyed bya'o// snyam nas de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun tu rung ba'i las byed pa'i
90b4: g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis btsug lag khang du rtag par chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chag
90b5: chag dang phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob phan lta nye dgas gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag dar bya'o/ / 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgan nugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ gtsug lag khang du dus su chos 'don
90b6: pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khad par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas gcig
90b7: shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lta nye dgas 'greng ba dang 'gro ba
90b8: dang 'dug pa dang nyal bas dus thams cad du chos bshad do/ / rnyed pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas pas
91a1: so bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dang byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyis sems dang par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dad par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur /
91a2: dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na gtsug lag khang phyag dar byas pas yon bdag bangon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid
91a3: dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des ci byin po sbyang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o de yang gnang la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de gnyis spobs pa med par byos nas
91a4: smras pa rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o/ / de gnyis kyis sngar sme phab pas smras pa/ gnas brtani ci bgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas
91a5: nye dgas cha gsum du byas te na gnyis kyi b.rad du ni ring nyid 'dug go/ / de gnyis kyi bdu ni chagacig bzhag pas gsol bar bya bar rtsams ga/ rgan zhugs byed nyon cig byed gnyis dang 'di gi 'diganyis dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo// 'di ni gsol ba'o// de nas cha
91a6: gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so/ / cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang de gnyis kyis smras pa dang / gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis brtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig/ des bgos par brtsams nas/
91a7: de nas ras yug cig kha khyer du 'dugs de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo // de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong na/ des
91a8: rdiD+har gyur ba rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis spras pa/ khyed de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi 'dza' ba rnams kyi mgren pa rdog pas mnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis
91b1: dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/ / thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the
91b2: chom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan thugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dar
91b3: 'ba' shig tu ma zad de 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyid nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis gang gi tshe nu'i nang du zhugs na nyanam la
91b4: thon par 'gyur zhing gang gi tshe skam la dong pa de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/ / de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o// /
91b5: de na gcig ni chur song do// gcig shos kyis ni skem la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la gton nas de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do// chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so// rdo tsam na
91b6: nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis bgos shig/ gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi bgod do ci'i phyir bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// /
91b7: de gnyis sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa/ tsha bo dag ci ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ gang po bdag cag ni nya rnyed pas so// sti mi byed/ zhang po nyes pas 'phri
91b8: so khyod ni nyes pas 'jigs pa bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis sdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa
92a1: ru sbal zhig mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag chur zhugs te/ bdag chung zhugs nas nya rnams bsogs te skam la 'thon pa dang 'dis bsang ngo // tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas zung
92a2: zang thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu'i nang du 'gro'o/ / skam la 'gro ba de ni sdong dum gyis 'jigs pa dang / che rams 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa dang / ma'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te
92a3: des ma bsad na khyod kyis bsgrogs kyang ci pan/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas 'dis ci byin pa de brang bar bya ste/ 'khad par mi bya'od des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas gcig
92a4: shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do// tsha bo gal te skam la song bas cung zad thob na lha bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro
92a5: pa de ni dpa' glong gis 'jigs pa dang ru sbal gyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin kum bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma sgrogs na khyod kyis ji ltar bsad/
92a6: mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang par mi bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi
92a7: g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do/ / de sngar srabab pas spras pa zhad pa ci bgyis pa bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/ nya'i 'jug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas
92a8: tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas 'jug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ de ni chos la gnas pas bkur// bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no snyam nas/ des nya chen
92b1: po zhig gi rked pa khyer te mi'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni/ shin tu don grub ga las
92b2: 'ongs des smras pa/ gang phyir srun po brtsod gyur cing // chos dang chos min mi shes pa'i rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des ni chos shes 'tsho bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pa lta na sdug pa khyod// pha rol mnan pa shin
92b3: du legs/ / de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin no// sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/
92b4: de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so// gleng gzhi na mi nyon yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// khyim bdag
92b5: de'i blo skyes pa/ ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// ji tsam na nyes dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/
92b6: re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de las ras yug cig ma grub na bdag nye dgA ma yin no// mnyam nas de 'gron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshad
92b7: gsol nas ras rnams 'brin pa na/ nye dgas ras yug cig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal te
92b8: mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsdams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de lta bu su zhig byed 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan
93a1: ma drangs so/ / des ras de khyer nas song ngo // de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gar ci byung ba ni dge
93a2: slong dag mgron dum bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis 'gron dum bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// tho rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes
93a3: nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyi dpal gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar
93a4: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na/ yang nye dgas 'gron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na/ bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod do// des bram ze'i khye'u
93a5: btu zla ba gsum 'gron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug reng bskon no snyam mo// de dang ha car yang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze rgan po zhig yod pa des thos nas de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras/
93a6: yug gcig khyer na song // bram sangs rnams 'brim par byed pa na/ dzi tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gi sa ras yug
93a7: gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su shig bgyid 'on kyang khyad kyis bram ze rgan po 'gron du pos sam/ bdag gis mgron du mamos so// des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo // bram ze des smad par brtsams so//
93a8: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te// de na yang de 'gron dram pos so// da lta na yang ngo // // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag gcig yod pa des gtsug lag
93b1: khang zhig brtsigs nas/ des dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed do// gtsug lag kha rede ni sa phyogs dben zhing bzang
93b2: ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dang ba dang // khrung khrud dang / rma bya dang ni tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsam na/
93b3: ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed/
93b4: pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas de nang bar sngar langs te song ngo // dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnam
93b5: kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis pa'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang / der gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du
93b6: rnyed pa nyung ngu'am phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// // sdom la bye ba rnams la skal pa ni sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/ dge 'dun
93b7: gyi ni chos gos kyi/ rnyed pa brgyad du byaba'o// // gleng gzhi na mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa byer gyi nang logs su dge 'dun dbye bar gyur na/ rnyed brtsal bar bgyi
93b8: 'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor kha gcig la ni sbyin no// kha gcig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la brtsal bar bgyi/ chos dang 'thun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bshA
94a1: pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa brtsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs
94a2: su dge slong gum par gyur na rnyed pa brtsal bar bgyi 'am/ rnyed pa bstsal bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig zhi me sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa
94a3: des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las gtsug pa/ khang der phyin pa dang khyim bdag des zas byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de
94a4: rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo / / ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las ri 'or de nyid du phyin nas khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin
94a5: no dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis
94a6: smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ deng lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom
94a7: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa dang / dge 'dun gyir btags pa dang / dge slong gir rtags pa
94a8: dang dbyar gyi dang / mngon gsum dang / so sor brtan pa'o// mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i
94b1: gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no/ / de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin no gso sbyong
94b2: tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca'
94b3: ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ / kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go// lam chen po dang / tshed dus dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mngon spyi'i yin no// zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis
94b4: dam bcas pa rnams kyis gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// /
94b5: dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// /
94b6: 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa nyid la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur
94b7: zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam
94b8: bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ / dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnam
95a1: kho na'o dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa bul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na// dam ma mas pa rnamasa'o//
95a2: na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam
95a3: bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams
95a4: kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su
95a5: dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas shes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal te bram ze dang khyim
95a6: bdag de rnams kyis lam po che dang / tsher dus dang bzhi me do dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar
95a7: 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsheng dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang
95a8: bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dmam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang
95b1: bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na
95b2: rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ka'o// lam po che dang / tsheng dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnam la chu drangs na rnyed
95b3: pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ka'o// lam po che dang / tsheng dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa
95b4: gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsheng dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / ma ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na
95b5: rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsher dus dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed
95b6: pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tsher dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su khas dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid du chu drangs na rnyed pa
95b7: gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// ji ltar na dam bcas pa rnams rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa'am bud med
95b8: dam ma ning gang la rten te byar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni dbo nar yin te/ 'di ni rten gyi thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig des la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni
96a1: dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ / dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig des la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i 'o// yang thog pa'i 'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes brtags pa ni de na dge
96a2: slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir rtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ mngon
96a3: sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltam pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan lnga
96a4: 'das pa la phul bstegal te mchod rten chen po bzhir 'khyer/ / mi nus na mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul gyi gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// // sdom la// gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang // bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang //
96a5: gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang // dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du/
96a6: gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas byung ba zhag gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas byung ba ni gnyis mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu
96a7: mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las gnas nas byang ba zhig gum lags na
96a8: rnye pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ / rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas byung ba rab tu mang po dang rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig thas
96b1: lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// gnas nas byung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na gum pa de'i yo byad
96b2: gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig shos so// gnas nas byung ba ni rab tu mngal rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas byung ba rnams las thog mar sdig
96b3: pa'i lte bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o/ / dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su ngam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shin dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i tshes gos dang lhung bzed long cig ces
96b4: po nya btang bar bya'o/ / dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par dgos pa yin
96b5: no/ / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo ba byed na legs thang tha sdom pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba
96b6: las de yang ma phyung bar shi nas dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o/ / dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
96b7: yin no/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsras te 'god par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngom pa yin no//
96b8: dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya bting bar bya'o// khas
97a1: blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes par dgos pa yin no/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nye bar bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi
97a2: dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ / dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyi
97a3: du shin dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yi de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o/ / khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes pa bgos pa yin no// /
97a4: dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'gad par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam
97a5: ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shin dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig/ ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged
97a6: par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ / dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'god par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
97a7: bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dmam bcas par bgyi'o// zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shin dam
97a8: ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams
97b1: 'god par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ / bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi/
97b2: gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas shin dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes
97b3: par bgos pa yin no/ / dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'god par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos
97b4: pa yin no/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smras pa las de yang ma phyung bar shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam
97b5: bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhang bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o/ / dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par
97b6: byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ / bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes pa bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// // sdom ni// nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brla par
97b7: ma sbyin dang blang bya dang / bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// nye dga'i spyi bor po la mig cig byung nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa mar 'u
97b8: gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ / nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te de ring kho na 'thungs na de ring nyid du sos par 'gyur na// sang mar dang gos blang bar ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re shig blangs la byin nas btud par bya'o snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams
98a1: chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang gnas rnams kun du mdags pa dang / de rnams kyis mang kyi bram pa dang mgasog pa'i gos pam mchechi ba spangs so// bye non par sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod san ga dngasas su
98a2: kyis mngags ma tam/ bzhin pazangs ma mthungs so// 'phags pa na legs pa zhig bgyis kyis de nyis rgyur tugasom cig/ des stan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas dzig smras pa thos sam/ mkhan /
98a3: a mangs sa// dzin pa nas d+hu/ sa lag na gas sa gas kyis smra shig/ mas kyis pa sa mas// gang ba sam chags par rna pas ma sa 'phru
98a4: pas de'i nid da skyes par gyur / ma na yang san pa 'dus nas rnaMs pa/ 'phags pa ma gsos tam/ pani/ bangs ma mthungs so// phags pa ma legs pa shig bgyis so// des smras pa/ bzhin thangs de nasam
98a5: b+hung du chung / / snyan pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gas nyi ma kyi sgrom byin du sa par gyur kyang ni rtsod la srogs mchis so// swam+b+has pa/ bgi na gsog/ drub khyod kyim thal bdog pas seMnan ma ma grus dang sos pa /
98a6: do sman pa des 'jal to zhes byas nas khros te song ngo // de nas nye dgas mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las mthu nas sha'o// de la gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni chos gos las so// cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman las so// 6
98a7: gsum pa ni rdungs su byas pa dang mabyas pa las te/ gser srung gsum khri b+h+ring ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis bos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dga' bum pa las de la gseng mang du byu ste/ gseng srang su ma ma chis kyis /
98a8: la bka' phul ba'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig/ dge slong rnams de khyor te sreg tu dong ngo // de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btabapo// dge slong rnams kyi dung khrod duseMm/
98b1: nas gtsag lag khang du 'ongs pa na gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsam pa/ kun dga' bo song
98b2: lang tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig tses byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bye ba byed pa de'i tshe khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag matong ba'am bgam
98b3: len pa de'i tshe dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'a ma'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang na ba'i rkyen ci dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on rten la rim 'gro byas sam zhes gyis shig gal te ma bgyis so zhes sman
98b4: de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod thong shig ces slos shig/
98b5: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'chal zhes tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal pogs la rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin spros pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis/
98b6: bka' jiskad stsal pa de bzhin du gyi ste/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid de de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po sa lan gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsas pa/ dge slong dag byed
98b7: kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad pa gos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyur ste sbyar nas bgos so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas de la ga ser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis
98b8: bgos sa zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang
99a1: lhan cig yang bgos so/ / yangs pa can pa dang / bA rA Na sI ba dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dag tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus pa
99a2: dge slong rnams bsdur cing 'ged pa na lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa por ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste/
99a3: lnga gang zhe na/ gan DI dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol ba'o// shi ba'i gan rdzi rdud pa na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'dres/
99a4: pa dang gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na shi ba'i yod byad thams cad gsol bar byas te bgos na mi 'khrug par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun thams cad tshegs shing/
99a5: 'thun par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol bar bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dag
99a6: gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gdar ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga'agum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang
99a7: mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab bo/ / 'di ni gsol ba'o dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ gsol ba'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa nye ba
99a8: 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gdan dge 'dun mi 'thun pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor thog ma dang tha ma byas nas zag zar bya'o//
99b1: dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyis gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// /
99b2: gsol pa 'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tsam skyes nas the tsa ma thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan/
99b3: pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par 'gyur ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag
99b4: sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnan pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tsher bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pas de srog dang phral lo// ji tsam na mu stegs pa rkun po lnga brgya ri 'or zhig btsam
99b5: nas phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo // mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bsad rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis nyis brgya lnga bcus ni glang po che'i sha bcad la bco'o// nyes brgya lnga bcus ni chu blango'o//
99b6: de ni glang po che ga gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la lhag ma dug gis sud
99b7: gdab po de dag gis sha dug can zos pa dang / 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas lhag ma dug gis btab po// gang dag chu la dong pa de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin dud byed nas rku ci yo gab 'thungs nas
99b8: lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thung la/ gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas des ro de
100a1: dag thams cad mthong ngo / / de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste/ gzhu chud kyi rtod pa nus pa bca' bar brtsams te/ de nas
100a2: rgyurgyas bachod pa dang mchog mas dkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to/ / lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ bsags par yang ni bya ba ste// lhag par bsags par mi bya'o// sogs la chags pa'i wa long pa// gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos// dge slong
100a3: dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khragang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas she'o// da ltar yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to// / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// / de'i tshe dge slong
100a4: nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bzhig yod pa de dge slong gis rang 'gro byas nas 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas de'i ltung bad dang chos ga nyid pa de mthar khyer pa dang / de nas chos gos gcig pa rka ci dag gis 'bags shing spang ma rnams
100a5: 'du bar gyur to/ / de nas gos 'ged pas rim 'gro byed pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ngan pa byas te/ chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig/ des smras pa/ yo byad ni khyod 'ged na kho bo 'khru 'am/ khyod nyid kyis khrus shig/ skabs
100a6: de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o// gal te nad g.yog mang bar gyur na thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar
100a7: bya'o/ / dge slong shes nyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul gyi yo byad dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gi yo byad drug bkur bar
100a8: bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/ / zhes des bsdams shing bsdams shing bzang po rnams blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
100b1: stsal pa ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma rnams las sbyin par bya'o// nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas
100b2: par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar rtag par bya'o// de'i bye ba nyams par mi bya ste// lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal par bya'o// // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nang pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas
100b3: skabs la brtags nas dge slong zhig la smras pa/ re shig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du midro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo sha nis khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na dge slong de shi'o//
100b4: de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyis phul cig/ des smras pa/ des kho bo la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
100b5: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de gson pa'i tshe nyid na ma byin na shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal pa sbyin par bya'o// /
100b6: de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas des lus kyi gnas la brtags te rim 'gro byed pa la smras pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyi dag gi ched du mchod pa gyis shig/ des 'as
100b7: blangs pa las de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim 'gro byed pa la ji skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / dge
100b8: slong dag dge slong de log par lhung ngo / / gal te tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod par byas par gyur dang dad pa skyes pas log par lhung bar mi 'gyur ba nig// de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs
101a1: par spyod pa na ni yal bar mi bzhag ste/ nade g.yog sbyin par bya'o// des de la dris te/ gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs so// ji ste ma grub na dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no// ji ste de yang ma
101a2: grub na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing rim 'gro byed pas bsgyur nas rim 'gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o// sos par gyur na de la 'i
101a3: ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te khyod kyi yo byad du bcad do zhes rjod par bya'o/ / gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'bad de bsam par bya'o// gal te med na de ni spyod pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pa'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //
101a4: gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba tshor bas nyen pa zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim 'gro byed pa la smras pa/ kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig des
101a5: ma byin pa dang de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so/ / dge slong rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so//
101a6: gos 'ged pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed gzhag pa'i sdod mar bye shig/ de bzhin
101a7: gshegs pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phye ba dang sbrul zhig mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi
101a8: sgra bslang nas bka' stsal pa/ mi gti mug can lhung bzed 'di spongs la song shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro// de 'khrugs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod las kyis song ste/ nags stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/ des der khros pa'i me sbar bas
101b1: nags de rab tu 'bar te de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag srid pa thams cad las skrag par gyis shig/ srid pa'i
101b2: yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig gi lus de gnas gsum po nags stug por khros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i dang / dur khrod du me phal bas sreg par 'gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o// de lta bas na dge slong
101b3: gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing gang la skye ba de yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / ma spangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad slong na rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar sbyin par bya'o// ma byin
101b4: na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / // gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas kha ngang shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nad du skyes so// gos 'ged pas lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo'o zhes dge slong de'i gnas
101b5: khang du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de kun nas bkres pa drag pos dbyugapa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/ re shig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/ de sngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de dge slong
101b6: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re shig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas phyinas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o// // gleng bzhin mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong zhig shin
101b7: dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste/ dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas/ gtsug lag khang du lhags te/ gos 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bga'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas dbyug pa blangs te langs nas
101b8: des smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i rol mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged par byed dam zhi ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar
102a1: de'i ro la mchod pa byas la de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro/ / // gleng gizhi na mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer
102a2: te rol mchod pa byas bsregs nas de nas gtsug lag khang du lhagra pa dang / gos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las des dbyug pa blangs te langs nas re shig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dman
102a3: ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// // sdom la/ nad pa dang ni tshed dpon
102a4: dang / dngos po'i sbyin pa lag gi bla/ mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang / pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o// // gleng gzhi na mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs
102a5: pa las dge slong gi dge 'dun lhags so/ / bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal pa zhes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms
102a6: kyi sku skal ba zhes te/ lnga po gang gis zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'dog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la
102a7: bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang / bslag bI ni 'aca' bar bzhed pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal ba zhes so// de nas bcom ldan
102a8: 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ba dang / gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang spyil po nas skyil po dang 'chags nas 'chags rnams su 'chag cing gzhegs
102b1: pan gtsug lag chen po gang na ba der byon pa dang / de na dge slong nad tshabs che ba shes pa chung ba rang gi gi shin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs
102b2: pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ / zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung na ci'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so// de
102b3: bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes du skad 'don/ btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'aka' yang rim 'gro bgyid pa 'am lta ba ma mchis so// dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim 'gro dang /
102b4: pa byas pa yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so// de bas na khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'od zhing ri spos kyi dang ldang las sa
102b5: khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thus
102b6: sems kyis shes so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril po bkang ste ri spos kyi dang ljang las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs
102b7: tre 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no// gzhan yang byod
102b8: kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la lha rnams ni gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug shig/ ngas ni 'di'i rim 'gro bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang g.yung dung 'khyil pa can bsod nam
103a1: brgya phrag dums bsgrub pa/ bsgrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas dge slong de bzung ste gcin dang ngan spyugs nas phyung nas mtha' cig tu gzhag ste/ smug gi tshal bas gzhang nas sa dkar pos dril phyis byas te
103a2: bkrus so/ / de nas dkyil mo bkrung 'char bcug ste/ de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te/ phyogs de yang ba'i lji ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do// de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nang ba la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro
103a3: ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyis bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // chos nyid
103a4: k yis sangs rgyas bcom ldan das rnams ni bsod snyoms bsgoms nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do dge slong cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par
103a5: tshim par byas sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/
103a6: btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la gtsug
103a7: lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che bzhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la zos nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de/ bsod snyoms ched kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do zhes gyis shig/ btsun pa
103a8: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyad khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so// // 'dul ba bzhi/ bam po drug bcu drug pa/ de nas
103b1: dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni khams gsum gyi bra ma nyid kyis ri ma gro dzad de/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gis bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyod nas le los dus 'das par byed pa ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/ mal
103b2: bdag nam gyi cha bstod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ des nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig
103b3: ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur to// dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi
103b4: 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang gser du snyam po/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du mtshungs pa'i sems tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par
103b5: rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyi mchod par bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
103b6: kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nang ba 'di dag la ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/ pa med/ rtsa lag gzhan med do// de lta bas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phan tshun
103b7: dri rim gro byas ste/ mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i'o// lhan cig gnas pas na mkhan po'i'o// srab dpon gyis ni nye gnas kyi'o// nye gnas kyis ni slob dpon gyi'o// mkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig pa'i'o// slob dpon cig
103b8: pas ni slob dpon cig pa'i'o/ / gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa'i'o// phebs par smra bas ni phebs par smra ba'i'o// smos 'drin gyis ni smos 'drin gyi'o// 'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas skabs
104a1: la brtags nas rim gro pa gcig gam/ gnyis sapa/ mang po sbyin te mthar na dge 'dun kun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tshom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
104a2: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas des dgra bcom pa son sur bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i dam
104a3: gro byas nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon gsum du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang chu phug sum tshogs pa shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan
104a4: pa zhig gnas so/ / des slob ma'i rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa
104a5: ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i ri mi gro byas so// da ltar yang byas so// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par yang nang pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom
