196b6: snyam pa dang / de la rten pa rgya mtshori 'gram na 'dug pa zhig gis nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skyes su bkur nas/ des de mchod rten la btags pa dang de'i mthus des dbu sna dang sen mo'i mchod rten de nyin mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // de nas dad pa skyes te smon
196b7: lam bta la/ ji ltangs phyogs 'di ba dag gi zhang pos rgyal bragazhon nu las gser dang byig gshibs pas nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyangs phyogs
196b8: ' di gsar dang dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing de rnams kyi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i spyan sngar bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon
197a1: sum du byas par gyur cig ces btab po/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de tshun chad bskal pa sum bcu rtsa gcig la ston pa gtsug gtor can
197a2: zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dngas phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum nor bu gshibs
197a3: pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de lta rin ba ste// 'on
197a4: kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ / de'i 'og tu bskal pa sum bcu rtsa gcig pa de nyid la ston pa thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug
197a5: khri dngas phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ / de'i tshe khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di rgyang grags gnyis mu tig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo//
197a6: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyaman khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya bar
197a7: nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong bzhi khri dang lhan cig phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'dir ba lang gis bkar bas gzhon du las nyos
197a8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag
197b1: mgon ma zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ / de'i 'ogo kra bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo sum khri thub pa na ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong sum khi dang phyogs
197b2: 'di da gshegs so/ / de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba zung ste/ des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim
197b3: bdag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur ba de ga zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
197b4: sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag chu stod ces bya ba byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang
197b5: grags phyed gser gyi nas bkram pas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag chu stod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na
197b6: khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgo ni med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// dge slong dag da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/
197b7: 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par yang 'jig rten tu byung nas de 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na/ da ltar yang khyim bdag mgon med zas b+hin gyis rmon pa dor
197b8: bcu drug gis rmos pa'i khyon bye ba gshibs pa/ gzibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las nyos nyed nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo// dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dgra bcom pa
198a1: khrag khrig phrag dgu dang ther 'bum chen po phrag drug phyogs 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe khyim bdag nor bzangs zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur to// des phyogs 'di dpag tshad gsum gser dang dbyig gshebs pas gzhon nu las nyos
198a2: nas byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dbul bar 'gyur zhing / de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dris kyi byi bdag nor bzangs zhes bya ba
198a3: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyed kyis de ltar mibalta ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid khyim bdag nor bzangs shes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtar bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po
198a4: med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chud yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas kun du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thad la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang /
198a5: gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong ngo zhes grags so// de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu sna tshogs rtog khang du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag/ gleng par
198a6: byed de shes ldan dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur/
198a7: de'i tshe bram ze'i bye'u phyugs sten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod cig dang / khe bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang /
198a8: bdag po med pa dang / thaMd la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur pa brtags la khyed la smras par bya'o zhes de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len
198b1: cing rjes bzhin 'brang ngo / / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin chu bo ma thi rab tir khrus byas nas byung ba la des de'i rgyab tu thal mo brgyab pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go// des smras pa/ khyim bdag
198b2: khyod ni phebs pa yin ning bzod pa dang nges pa dang ldan pa yin pas des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na med pa dang / gang dag thag nyen yod pa mthong // des mu sogs can rnams ma
198b3: bar byas pa dang / mu stags can 'dom can rnams kyis kyang kun du smras pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bzod pa dang nges pa dang ldan pas des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang / gang dag tung gi/
198b4: bo na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes kun tu sgra grags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag mu stegs can brgya stong phrag bye bas kyang khyim bdag mgon
198b5: med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan na gnyer mthong bar 'gyur ba shes par slab ma yin no/ / 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras bu rin po chen ltar bkra ba dang / dbyig gi skad yod de/ des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag pa'i
198b6: pa dang / thad la yod pa dang / chan yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring pon yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo // 'dul ba gzhi// bam po bdun bcu drug pa/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
198b7: ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag pa
198b8: mang zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yangs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byur bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig ni rtsong
199a1: na mang gas sa na sags pa na bya ma mas khams 'as par pa me ra/ sa zug ma ma bya / rlag gyu masas dpa ga zu ga gas/
199a2: sa sa/ rna pas 'on rnam par da 'gyur / las rnams panal pa rdzu // rgyud zab chogs dang / smyen rdzas na / nasas gru / sa dang / ldanan pa gas
199a3: na yangs la su ma/ yongasasu bzung bams rgA tshig/ rnamams kyi then dang ldan/ rnam thos kyi thal do gyis ldan pazhig gnas// desa'i dus pa'i tsham gag gi rnams pang bras shing da padang / zung zla / bya da
199a4: dang / ga pa 'das ldan pa rnags ma rdzu/ med ldan pa dang / sa gnas sa byung med sha sa nam lda sa gnasasas la / dig yin gnas sa
199a5: da thung zu pa nams sacas nag 'a ga gas 'du phyi mam cam byas nas/ ma byung kyi nim gyis dag sa smram pa/ ya bya sa thang ban pa
199a6: nig pa'ags so/ / des thos nas da yi dga' bar gyur ning dang pa skyes te/ gang gi bskyed pos tshal na 'di 'dra ba'i rar/ byung ba gnas pa ni bdag skal can yin no/ ma mo// bdag nyid chen po de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dkyisas zhugs te yongs sum
199a7: nalas 'das so/ / denas khyim bdag/ deb mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyer dang / na mi rnams dang ldan cig/ bkur stechen por byas nas 'asregs te/ mede'ibs pasad nas dras pa des rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du ni po che dang sres zhugs pa dang rus pa
199a8: rnams 'o dang ldan ning sgra byin par gyur to/ / de nas deng rung dugatugs nas smon lam gakhapa/ ji gyur rus pa 'odi rnams rin po che dang sras nas shin du 'dadang ldan zhing ma 'byen pa de zhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che skar ba bzhir gyis
199b1: gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam bdab pa gang yin pa dang / khyim bdag rgyal gyi
199b2: tsha bor gyur pa na des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de
199b3: lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gnag pa dang 'dren pa gang yin pa rnams
199b4: ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// // bar sdom ni/ rgyal dang rgyas pa mchu dang ni// srid sbyin dang ni phur bu dang // chu stor dang ni zas sbyin dang / khyim pa ni nor bzangs yin// dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang ni//
199b5: gsum pa nor bu tig yin// ba dang nas dang gos dang ni/ bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba'i gshibs sgra bshibs nas gzhon rgyal byed las nyos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe yul sna tshogs
199b6: na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags nas/ de rnams las kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi slad du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gzhi cung zad brtsig go// dge slong
199b7: rnams kyis smras pa/ rin gyi sa sa nyos la rtsigs shig/ 'phags pa rin ci/ ji tsam stsal lags/ dbyig 'di snyed do// 'phags pa re shig 'di snyed kyi 'byor ba lta bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/ de lha mos kyi gal te/ phyogs 'di thob na brtsig ni/ shes pa'i mabs de
199b8: slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ khyim bdag la rtogs la gal te byin ni rtsigs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin la brtags pa dang des smras pa/ gal ta ba dag la brten khram
200a1: ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge 'dun gyi byiphyir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na stsal to/ / gang zag gi phyir bgyid na mi skyel to zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
200a2: de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ni brtsig par bya'o// gang zag gi phyir ni yon bdag la brtags te gal te byin na brtsig par bya'o// ma byin na brtsig par mi bya'o// glo bur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na de rnams spos 'dzin
200a3: ji lta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ba dang / gzhan dag la smos 'drin med pa de dag phongs par gyur nas byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o// ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa
200a4: der dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ ji tsam na ri bor der dbyar gyi nang logs su 'jigs pa byung nas/ de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas/ dgag dbye ma byas par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de nas dge slong rnams kyis lam gyis dub
200a5: par la sor bcug ste/ lam gyis dub pa de la sos nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la gnas mal skos shig/ de rnams kyis dbyar gyi nad logs yin no snyam nas ma bskos pa dang / glo bud pa'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs
200a6: 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed da ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ gal te khyed la 'gyed pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas byin cig/ de rnams 'on kyang ma bskos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
200a7: ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan
200a8: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing dbyar zla tha chungs la dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes
200b1: gsungs pa dang / ci tsam na 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams
200b2: la brten nas dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca pa bcas kyi gsum pa ni ma yin no/ / 'jigs pas ral ba'i dge slong rnams kyang spos 'dri na ji lta ba bzhin du ral sor gzhug par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su sko bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das
200b3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams las su bsko bar mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnam la rnyed pa byin pa dang bcom ldan 'dis kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyin no// dge slong rnams kyis kha zas kyi rnyed pa yang ma byin pa dang bcom ldan 'das
200b4: kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la kha zas kyi rnyed pa ni sprin gyi gos kyi rnyed pa ni ma yin no// dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang mang du brtsigs pa las mnyan yod na dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de rnams stong par 'dug
200b5: pas srin padag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams med cing na la phrug rnams kyi gnas su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad bgo bar bya ste/ re res kyang so sor gnyis sam/ gsum sa ma/ bzhi ci rin pa thams cad la
200b6: longs spyad par bya ste/ la lar ni snga dro 'dug par bya'o// la lar ni nyi ma'i gung la'o/ la lar ni phyi dro'o// la lar ni nub mo gnas par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las ma byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
200b7: yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs/ gal te ma grub par gyur na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcom par bya'o// gal te mi nus par bya ba bcos nus pa de tsam mo bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
200b8: bstan pa rgyas pa de'i tshe dge slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams gnas khang gi phongs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyis bsgo bar bya ste/ chu snod gzhag pa dang / 'dag chal dang / sman dang / so shing
201a1: gzhag pa dang / phan tshun gyi thamaskas ma gtogs par chung ngun 'dug pa'i chad tsam yang thams cad kyis bgo par bya ste/ nye 'khor ni spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dgon pa dang / shing drung dang / khang stong
201a2: dang ri su la dang / brag phrug dang / rtswa'i stan dang / bla gab med pa dang / dur khrod dang / nags mtha' dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su bsam gtan gyis shig/ phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar brag yod par gyis shig ces dgon pa'i bsngags
201a3: pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe dge slong kha cig dgon papa dam bcas nas dgon pa nas gnas pa las/ de rnams de na chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to// gtogs nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par
201a4: gyur pas lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang / gdon pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba nyams par byur ba'i rna/ sa de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas
201a5: gzhag par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang / dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas sgo
201a6: bcad de lde mag blangs nas song ba dang / dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag/ phongs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gnas gsal bar dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o// nye dgas khyim bdag cig gtsug lag
201a7: khang cig rbabacu gnas/ de ni de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs pa de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni bdag nyid kyis khyer ro// ji tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa dang des gtsug lag khang stong par mthong nas de
201a8: dris pa/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge slong nye dga'i yin no// de de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug la rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo'i yin no// de der gnas te des
201b1: gtsug lag khang de 'a 'ga' yang phyag dang ma byas/ ba'i lci ba gsar pa'i byug pas ma byugs so// de ji tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo // dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs te des kyang nye dga' las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang /
201b2: gtsug lag khang de phyag dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas deng phyag dang byas nas phyag dang por te phyags mi zi ni bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyags mal
201b3: nathogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/ phyags mde mi bzhag gam/ des smras pa/ 'di ni lag ba srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas pa lta ste/ des na phyags ma'i rjes kyang med do// des smras pa/ 'di na dge slong chos gos gsum pa cheg mo zhig gnas so// de ma
201b4: nades de bsong stobs la rgyu ba mthong nas mnongs so/ / des smras pa/ rnyed pa ni nye dgas khyer la de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dang bya'am zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
201b5: rnyed pa su 'byer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dang bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon pa rdzobar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na// khyim bad/
201b6: gcig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/ des de yon bsngo thos te de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug lag khang bcig na/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yon pa gang yadza dam/ des smras pa/ tsigs shig dang / legs par sngo'o//
201b7: nakhyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhigacig tu bcug nas des deng ci lang ma bzhag go// de stong pa nyid du 'dug pa dzi na man khyim bdag des mthong nas des gtsugalag khang du 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gzug lag khang stod par mchis na de nas la
201b8: ji bzhugs sa pa/ dge 'dun ci gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bzhin zangs mi zhum pas so// khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags patshu no can dgon drang la brtsigs pa lag la srum par 'gyur/ khyim bdag / da la bsams nas kha ba slab ma yin te/
202a1: de na rnyed pa med do// des smras pa/ 'phags pa ni na bdag gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ra sa yug chen po bskon no// nye dag sa rnyed pa thob po snyam nas gral rims kyis bab pa na rang gi skal pa blangs nas de ni gzhan nyid na gnas te/ de ni stong par 'dug go//
202a2: ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod tu 'ongs pa des gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas/ des dge slong dag la dris pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yin mod kyi/ dge slong nye
202a3: dga'i skal bar dbang ngo / / de nye dga'i drung du song nas khyod kyi bskal pa'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go// des smras pa/ de bzhin du byos shig/ de de na gnas pa na bsod snyoms pa de mkhas pa snyom las mi byed pa zhig yin pas des de nyin ma re re byug pa dang / phyag
202a4: dar byas so/ / phyag dar byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid sems dad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dang par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bstsogs pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro
202a5: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der so
202a6: na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang / phyag dar byed pa mthong nas de dad pa skyes te/ des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen po skon pa nyi dag/ sa thos nas de rings par dris par song ste smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khang 'di kho bo'i skal pa yin gyis/
202a7: ras yug can po 'bos byin cig/ bsod snyoms pas bsams pa// chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'on kyang 'dis mthus byer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag lang nas bskrad par 'byur ro snyam nas des de 'byin pa'i skabs /
202a8: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa ni de khon yin no// dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no// 'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas
202b1: bdag nyid dang bu dang chud ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas las gron du 'bod par byed do// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la bye ma rnams su dong ba dang ma byin par
202b2: len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag yarang nas brkus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bcang la lde mig blangs la dong par bya'o// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang ldamig byas te btus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srungs ma 'dag
202b3: slong bzhag la dong par bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyis bral ba med par bya'o// mabyin par len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khring de 'ongs nas/ des sgo phye zhes smras nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam/ rim med ces pada' bar/
202b4: 'o// ti mas gcas so zhes na cog/ na ma pa sbed ces smras skye ma gyun// gzhan ya / slang dgon pa pas ma ltang sbyin pa gzhagapa smra'o// som ldan dus kyis dge slong dag pa so myed pan
202b5: nas gsus pa dang / dgas nam kyil laman mam ci 'am ma gyi nas mam ldan 'das cing ba/ dgas galas hU~M/ de la mye zug sa sbyid pada'o//
202b6: kyis kyis ngas pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor ba dang / gtsug lagakhang ster mos thud cing bshang pa dang drims ma rung bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag sa dge slong kyi spel ba'i kun du spyad pa'i chos ca par bya
202b7: slong kyi bral papa dang nga la sal ba cad rten kyi 'byo sa dang rtag lag la ba swA )/ / rtse mos kyang ba gang yin pa de snyam par bya// bags pa dang gnyis pa pang byug par bya'o// da slong kyi la pas can stong
202b8: bzhin yang da bar thas te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal chabs sa du 'byung ba/ / da sa dang ldan das gtsug laga' zhags dge 'dun gyi gnas gzhan gyur pa dang / de tsa ma de ge 'dun gyi gnas tan gzhid nag
203a1: nas nye dgas bsams pa/ bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa la gan brtan gnyis par bya ba 'am/ bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro ro snyam pa las gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag kha
203a2: gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / dge 'dun de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yin nas des bsams pa/ bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na spogs med par dge 'dun gyi/
203a3: gnas btan gyis ci zhig bya zhes de slar rings pa rings pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal byed brkosko/ sa tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des smras pa/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig/
203a4: dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes te ma bskos pa dang nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam kyi/ rgan rims ji u0f7f/ ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang bskos shig ces pa'i
203a5: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi 'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song bzhig yini de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar
203a6: bya'o/ / gzhan gyi ni gar bab pa bzhin du'o// nye dga' lhag par chags pas gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro/ snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/
203a7: des dbyar 'das nas rnyed pa mnos pa dang / gcig nas kyang ma thob/ gcig shos nas kyang mthob nas/ gnas mal 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams la la zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
203a8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la rnyed pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag
203b1: 'dag nyas ga nas sbyin par mi bya'o/ / gcig nas byin pa dang dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ zer bar byed de gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/ bcom
203b2: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyed byed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gi sa gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o// dam 'cha' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
203b3: khyi mi bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/ gcig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no// gcig shos ni grong mtha' ba rnams kyi yin no// khyim bdag de'i kun du spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong
203b4: gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas deras yug chen rnams khyer te dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / nye dgas dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas
203b5: des dga' bo la spring ba/ gal te 'di rnyed pa 'bul na rgal pa nos shig ces smras nas/ de rings pa rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du song ba dang khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa/
203b6: 'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang der song gis/ de ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las re shig grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la byis 'dir dbul lo snyam nas/ de'i phyir log na paras
203b7: yug po che brim par brtsams pa na dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang khyim bdag des ras yug po che cig byan no/ / yang bzed pa dang khyimi bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod la ras yug po che bu la lags na ci yang bzhed dam/

204a4: gzad pas/ gas / du l+r-i ma / napa pa mthams ca yod pa ngas rgyas bcoMm ldan da sa nas / bdun byedags sug par chags pas sa drug mas bya pa sa ga
204a5: lan 'asarnam pa/ dgang ga su ba nig tu ban/ sa 'dus pa'i sa de 'ang gag pa dgas pams dpa sa pa na / dag slo nga bar mthar
204a6: na gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod de/ gcig na ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o// gcig shos na ni bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o// ji tsam na khyig/ TI wA shes pa zhig yod de/ deg Na nI'i sgrathos nas dge 'dun gyi rnyid pa yod pa'i/
204a7: gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bad kyi lhag ma byin pa dang de de zas nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos na dga' mgur 'gro'o// ji tsam dung

205a1: cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nya 'khor thams cad bsgo bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang bsgos shig ces ze na 'di bskos zin no zhem rjod par bya zhing / gtsug lag
205a2: khang gi nye 'along bskos shig zhe na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran skos shig cen/ 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga'i rab bskos shig
205a3: ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya'o// de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na gang la nyes bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas sngo ba rnams med/
205a4: phyir rgol ba rnams med/ mi mdza' ba rnams med nas de'i 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
205a5: ji tsam na dge slong nang shi gcig yod pa de bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/ de ni thams cad pas gzhon pas de'i gnas khang gzhan ni mthob bo// dge slong des de
205a6: la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di khe bo'i yin par bskos kyis byung shig/ des smras pa/ bdag bro 'tshal zas nam sos pa na'o// dge slong de gtum po zhig pas des phyung nas gang dgar bzhag go/ ji tsam na bum sa
205a7: dang khyam bdagra gtsug lag khang lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis dge slong de mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci dge slong 'di gum lags sam/ bzhin zangs dag 'di shi ba ni ma yin no// 'o ni ci'i phyir 'dir
205a8: bzhag/ 'dibs ches rgan pa'i dge slong shig 'ongs nas/ 'di'i gnas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang des 'di phyung nas 'dir bzhag go// 'phags pa bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang nang pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir khyim nas mi
205b1: 'byin na khyed cag da byung la ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/ de ji ltar nad pa phyir 'byin par byed ces de rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
205b2: dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong nang pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nang pa la gzhi spang bar sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / tshe dang
205b3: ldan pa nye dgas mjal to zhes byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ / ji tsam na zhag drug gam bdun na gnas mal 'gyed par gyur pa na rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas te gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang / gnas khang 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams
205b4: kyis nad pa yin no/ / snyam nas de'i gnas mal bskos so// de gnas mal bskos zin nas rma'i g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go/ nad pa lta ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la dris pa/ ci gnas brtan zhabs bskur ba sos sam/
205b5: des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed de thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma stsal tam// ci kho bo'i nad rtag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan myur du sos par 'gyur ba na bar sgyu ni ma btab grang /
205b6: des smras pa/ kho bo gnas khang sgo drung du gzhag par 'dod dam ci/ dge slong don nyung ba rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed// kha zer bar byed de/ de ltar dge slong dag min bzhin du gnas khang spang ba rang gir byed pa ce'i tha
205b7: tshig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par mi bya zhing des rang gir yang
205b8: mi bya'o/ / rang gir byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// lnga tshan rnams kyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni// mdun du bdar dang rang khrims dang // ma chags pa dang de bzhin du// snang ba skyes dang byung ba dang // bar du gcod dang de bzhin du/
206a1: phyi mar byas pa lung ba ste/ bsdus pa'i sdom du bsdus pa yin// bar sdom ni/ mdun du bya dang gzhan dang yang // nad dang gzhan rnams dag dang ni// sems can mang po phan bya ba// lnga tshan dag ni dang po yin//
206a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams la mdo sde dang ma mo bzhag go/ klu rnams la ni mdo sde'o// 'dul ba ni zab pa zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba khong du chud par dka' ba/ dgongs pa mang ba/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'thun pa yin no//
206a3: dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang / dgongs pa mang ba nyid dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'thun pa nyid yin pas 'don par mi spro'o// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bstan pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs
206a4: su nyams pa de'i bsngags pa lhag par brjod par mdzad pa yin pas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'khor bzhis mdun du bdar ba
206a5: yin/ gdam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi mdzod bsrung ba yin dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams kyi spyi bo na 'dug
206a6: pa yin/ dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar zhugs pa yin no// bar sdom ni/ bdag nyid khrims ldan mngon par bsu// 'gyod pa dang ni bag tsha med// chos dang
206a7: 'thun pas byed pa ste/ lnga tshan gnyis pa yin par bshad// gzhan yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di'i rang gi tshul khrims kyi phung pos legs par bsrung zhing legs par spras pa yin/ 'khor bzhis
206a8: mngon sum du bsu bar bya ba yin/ gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang na bag tsha ba med pas gnas pa yin/ chos dang 'thun pas phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa yin no// bar sdom ni/ ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang // /
206b1: bslang ba yi ni gzhi dag dang / snang ba dag ni gnyis po nyid// lnga tshan dag ni gsum pa yin/ gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ don ma 'dres par sel ba yin// don rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba la/
206b2: shin du nges pa yin/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par bzung ba yin/ sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/ skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi snang ba byed pa yin no// sdom ni/ snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni// sems las chung dang mi stong pa'o//
206b3: gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ phyogs gang na gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs der des sdang ba skyes pa dang / gsal ba skyes pa dang / 'od skyes par mthong / phyogs der de thugs bral
206b4: chung ngur gnas/ phyogs de des stong pa ma yin par mthong ngo // sdom ni/ byung dang de nas bcas pa dang // rjes su bcas dang de bzhin du// bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni/ lnga tshan lnga par byas pa'o// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin
206b5: pal phan yon lnga yod de/ / lnga gang zhe na/ byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rjes su bcas pa shes/ bkag pa shes/ rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no// sdom ni/ bar chad par chad ma yin dang / gdams ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang // slob ma'i
206b6: mthu ni yod pa ste/ sde tshan drug pa dag tu bshad// gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bar du gcod pa rnams shes/ bar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/ 'dom par byed/ rjes su ston par
206b7: byed lhan cag gnas pa dang nya gnas rnams gnas 'char 'jug nus so/ / sdom ni/ ltung ba dang ni ltung ba min// lha ding yang dang de bzhin du// so sor thar pa rgyas par yang // gdon pa dag ni lnga tshan yin/ gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin
206b8: pal phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ ltung ba byung ba shes/ ltung ba ma byung ba shes/ lci ba shes/ yang bshes shing / de so sor thar pa'i mdo ngag gdon pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dang /
207a1: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 'dul ba'i gling gzhiding byung ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur nas dge slong gnas
207a2: ga na rnams 'dul ba kun chub par dbyed par 'gyur ra sAm ste/ gus pas bstan par brnams pas de lus srab med sod gyur zhing ring ba dang / nyam rung ba dang / nabs nyam dmas par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
207a3: mkhyen bzhin du med par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du med kyis mi mkhyen par mi med/ dus su med ces dus las yol bar ma med/ don dang ldan pa dang kyi don dang me 'an pa mi dpa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ning na nga na
207a4: pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/ / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa med pa la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir
207a5: dge slong ba 'khor lus skya bong sa sang por gyur zhing ra ba dang / nyam chung ba dang / nabs nyam dngas par gyur/ des gas ba/ bcom ldan das kyis 'dus pa'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dge slong gnas gan gnas na rnams kyi
207a6: zos nas spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhes gus pas bstan par brtsams te/
207a7: des na de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur zhing ring ba dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro 'chal bas nyam ngams par gyur lags so// byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas
207a8: lung 'dogs pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnams pazhing lung 'bog par bya ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'geng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na'o// lung nang
207b1: pa'i dge slong gi spyong lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/ gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong 'chag sar lung nod pa'i dge slong 'ongs la gsar bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la/ khams snyoms sam zhes
207b2: dris nas lus pad da sems dang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bkri zhing lung med par bya'o/ / ji ste chas nan zhig yinan das khams rnams sam zhes dris nas lus bcud desems drang por gus pa dang /
207b3: bcas pas gom pa bkri zhing lung mnod pa bya'o// ji ste 'phreng ba na 'ongs pa la gsang bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas stan ches dam 'bral cog tsog por 'dug la sems drang pos gus pa dang
207b4: bam pas srang mnod par bya'o/ / ji san na nin pa das khams snyoms sam zhes das la sras cang nas sems dang bas gus pa dang babs pas lung ba no pa bya'o// 'breng ba la ris bzhin
207b5: nga 'dug pa dang / nyal ba la yang sbyang bar bya'o// lung 'bog pa'i dge slong gis shin du goms pa dang / legs par byung ba dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung 'brog par bya'o//
207b6: lung na pas kyang shin byang ba dang / shin du zin pa dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung mnod par bya'o// srang 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang / lung nod pa'i dge slong gis gan spyong ba'i chos pas
207b7: bcas pa bzhi yang dag par grangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ban/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nub mo byin nas/ de rnams 'brobs
207b8: bshes jil pa bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis ngal sor bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byed gnas ma la ga bos shig/ de dag gis smras paca dgos/ gnas mal bskar gzhug dang
208a1: de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas mal yod kyis bde bar nyol cig dang / nam nangs nas bsko'o// de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ ci khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa
208a2: nub par byed dam/ gal te khyed la 'gyed pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal skos shig/ de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal gorko ba zed nas gnas mal bskos pa dang / drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rims bzhin
208a3: du gnas mal mnos te nyal lo/ / ji tsam gzhon rims kyis bar du bsko ba de'i bar du na ma nangs so// drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal sdus shig 'dod do//
208a4: dge slong de nams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi nub cig gi phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo thob tsam 'am/ kye ma'o khyed cig 'di nyid tu 'dug shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' ba
208a5: dga' mnyan yod du dong ngo / / 'di dag ni rlung nang can yin no zhes byas nas dong pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yang /
208a6: dge slong dag de lta bas na su mo gnas mal bsko bar mi bya'o// gal te nub mo lpags na 'grogs pa shes ci lta ba bzhin du so sor ngal sor gzhug par bya'o// yul zhig nas dge slong mchod rten la bya byed pa zhig mnyan
208a7: yod du 'ongs na de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la
208a8: zhugs so/ / de bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du rab zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byed par brtsams so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las des de
208b1: mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa kun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin na mi rigs pa mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dro la bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam/ 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/ des smras pa/ khyod ci'i slad
208b2: ru bdag gi khyim du mi byon/ khyed kyi ming ci/ mgon med zas sbyin no// kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi/ khyod kyang mi shes la/ khyim yang mi shes so// khyim bdag mgon
208b3: med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ dge slong 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs na rgyus mi shes pa zhig yin te/ gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la/ bdag gi khyim yang ma shes kyis/ 'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba bcom
208b4: ldan 'das pa zhus la/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
208b5: phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong dag glo bur ba spyod yul ba zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yul du nye nas ra ba zhig gi
208b6: drung du g.yang zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de/ ma dad pa rnams yan lag 'das 'phags pa rnams la spyod par 'gyur ro// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gise gar yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar bar du bsti gnas
208b7: brtsig par bgyi ste/ gang zhig gang du drobab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag da lta bas na rjes su gnang gis rtsigs shig/ des gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyam bu
208b8: rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bstig nas dgartsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gang du drobab pa de der zas kyi bya ba byed do/ / dge slong gzhan dag chus yongs par gyur nas gyi mi bdag mgon med pas sbyin gyis der bron pa gos nam tsha gdun dmang du mar mi ga sa na
209a1: btab pas chu der phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags pa/ dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa byed
209a2: chags bdag cag gis mi byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ / chab 'dzag rten thams cad kyi kun mong khyed 'dog par mdzad pa zhes pa'i rna pas de dge sbyong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis da
209a3: stsal pa/ bgag par mi bya'o// bud med dge slong rnams la chu slong ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni kun nas zhags pa ste/ bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes
209a4: gsungs pas dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed pa na chags par gyur to/ / ji tsam na bud ma dbyar bzhin dang la ngo tsos rgyags pa zhig dge slong gzhon nu zhig la shin du chags pas de la chu blangs pa dang / de yang de la chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis slar
209a5: log kyang rgyun ma bcad par grugs te/ de yang de la rtog bzhin 'thungs pa la chud glor song nas shi'o// don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba
209a6: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med gang zhig chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis dge slong la chu slong ba de'i rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o// bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyim pa khong la 'thung shig ces bsgo la/ skabs skabs
209a7: su bcad cing blags par bya'o/ / gzhan dun 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // 'dul ba'i gzhi/ bam po bdun bcu bdun pa/ de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba de rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde
209a8: rnams kyis mo nas bstig nas su dang ste 'duganas bsod snyoms kyi thogs byer te 'od pa gang yin pa de la smras te/ gal te'o thug yin na ni lhung bzed bamed par byed de/ ci ste chu 'ug yin na ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang / mthu chen po'i dge 'dun pa phul cig
209b1: e sgra'o/ / de bzhin du grags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ khazer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
209b2: byas pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o// kha brngam byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang
209b3: gzhan du dong ste/ de rnams der byin pa na drol bab kyang 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ched du bsams te 'gro bar mi bya'o// ma bsams
209b4: par 'ong ba las gal te dro la bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// phongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong pa las de na dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang bza' bar 'dod pa las brtsod
209b5: bas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnam pa kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang snga mar de blangs la de yang gal te tshad med pa zhig tu 'drim na blang bar bya'o// ji ste dge slong tshad yod
209b6: par byas pa zhig yin na blang bar mi bya'o/ / len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ga shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so// de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis kyis bcom
209b7: ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang bsams pa/ ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa/ mdzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed/
209b8: dran par byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas lo ma bsko ba gsum dang / gnas lam gzung ba yang drug bya'o// gnas la ma bsko ba gsum gang
210a1: zhen dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o// gnas ma lagazung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang bran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang / kun/
210a2: dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras pa rang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bsgos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran
210a3: gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba bskos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya ste/ de rnams med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa/ 'dzem pa med pas bdag
210a4: cag la gleng bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug byas so// ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs pa na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs zin to// dge slong
210a5: rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal dang gtsug lag khang skos shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin no// khang phrano skos shig/ de yang bgos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig/ de yang bskos zin no// 'ang bran gyi nye 'khor
210a6: gos shig/ de yang brkos zin no// kun dga' bskos shig/ de yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ba'i nye 'khor skos shig/ de yang bskos zin no// gang gi phyir de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang / de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang dus mthon po dang sgra chen po
210a7: byung ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyis dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan par rmed kyis don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom
210a8: ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun
210b1: dga' bo kun dag 'o ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grag pa 'di ci zhig yin/ des gsol pa/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang / gnas ma la gzung ba drug 'gyis nas dge slong rnams kyis
210b2: gnas sa la mthob bar gyur te/ des na kun dga' ba'i nangangan skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon pa dang stargan po 'di thag lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba ngas 'tha krol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgong sa nas gnas mal ba so//
210b3: ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas ma la gzung ba drug mi bya'o// byed na 'gal
210b4: tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig du yul ko sa la'i ljongs chu zhing gshegs pa na grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab po// drug sde rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zheg
210b5: bzhag nas shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang gis bzung ngo / / dge slong gnas rten gnas brtan rnams kyis ni shing log stong dag thob bo// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te bsu nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
210b6: gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la btags na/ ji tsam na drug sde rnams ni shing bzang po dag gi nga na gnas la/ gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi ni shing lod stong rnams mthong nas/ des mjal to zhes byas nas bcom
210b7: ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu gdug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rgyal
210b8: po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gtso bo lags te/ yul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che rnams las thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos po gang lags pa de ni bdag gi lags na/ lhag ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du mchis brang dang / gzhon
211a1: nu dang blon po dang / khrom gyi dri pa rnams kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 'phags pa ko N+Da n+yi dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maudagal gyi bre dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen/
211a2: po rnams ni zhugs shing 'ong stong rnams kyi drung na mchis la/ drug sde rnams kyi ni zhugs shing bzad ches lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs shing la yang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi bca' ba mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
211a3: kyisi ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song
211a4: byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na shing rnams dang / sgar bu dang / gsil ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du sko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis shing dang / skad bu dang / gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko
211a5: bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams rang nyid sgo bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang sko ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis phal ba las bskos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge
211a6: slong gtsug lag khang 'ged par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ / bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'dzags pas 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga
211a7: dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ / bskos pa ni dbru dbang bya'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyang bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /
211a8: gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs sras mi 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa ste/ tshes 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la ga Na
211b1: rje ma 'as pa mig gi de/ rnams la ya dag pa / de sa thams mchogs shing ldan pa shi sham ba bya// mang dag bya byed / 'dran cigag ga'adag par bla ga deg slob zung dag shAn pa ga na //
211b2: blong gcigags gsol brgya telas bya/ de dun btsun pa rnams gsan dugamal/ gdu la khangan padag spang ming 'di nas bgyi ba di ni 'dun gyi gtsug lag 'ang na par stan/ gal te 'dun dus la babacing don dag 'dun gyis gang bang mdod gdang / 'di sang ga /
211b3: ma ming di na gyi dag ga lan ma na pa ca pa mad/ da gi la pa// yang bya na/ dag 'dun bdun pa rnams gsan gas/ gzug pag 'das 'dag kyang me 'di na pa da ga dun kyisag / ga'ang sgrubang ston pa 'di/ dang/ ngan ci ma
211b4: gas batha 'deg ca laga'ang rko bar bags na chad ldan pa gang gdag sang ming 'dis partse ba di gtsug lag 'dag pang bzad pa dganas mi gsung shig/ gang dag me bad pa dadag ni gsung shi/ dag dun gyis da ci gan na ba dag dran cis ga tha
211b5: zhes bcob 'di ga cug lag khang nobang bskos/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gtsug lag par 'ged pa rdo lta ba bzhin du byas la bsko ba dang / thug pa 'am pa dang / bag tshas 'dram pa dang / phran tshogs 'drim pa dang / snang byung rub ba dang / gos da bang pa
211b6: gos 'ged pa dang / dbyang rtsings chen sbed pa dang / dbyang byings chen 'ged pa dang / mag gzhug pa dang / mdzes 'chos pa yang de bzhin// chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar mi bya// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// ldag zhin/ 'dun pas 'gro dang / ne
211b7: sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang / mi mdzes pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni bsgo bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes
211b8: 'chos par ma bskos pa ni 'o/ / bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi tho ba dang / gti mugagis mi 'gro ba dang 'jigs pas mi tho ba dang / mangs pa dang mi mangs pags pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong jo
212a1: ba ma banos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/ / bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// gtsug pag khang dang zas 'ged dang / thug pa 'dri me dag pag chos dang // phran tshegs snod spyad sbed pa dang // chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du// dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang // 'ged pa dang ni ma /
212a2: gzhug dang // de bzhin du ni mdzes 'chos te// gang zag bcu gnyis yin par bshad// gnas lam gyi gzhi rdzogs s+ho// // cod pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ 'thab dang 'byed pa'i cod pa dang // rtsa ba gang dang dge ba gang // 'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang // 'gyed pa
212a3: rus ni zhi ba dang / / 'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba dang // tshul shing dag ni blang ba yis// gdam dag med pa mngon sum dang // dran dang ma myos 'dul 'os dang // de yi ngo bo tshal gzhug dang // rtswa bkram lta bur 'os pa yis// dge 'dun dag ni 'thun pa yis// de bzhin bya ba'i rtsod pa/
212a4: ni nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes// drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba/
212a5: phyir dus gsum du 'dong bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chad par mdzad de// rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'gro bar byed do// ji
212a6: tsam na dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das 'bor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas sbrad ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu'i chos bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan par byed do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang yang
212a7: ros banyan pa'i phyir rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des chos mnyan nas song ngo // de nas shAkya pard chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan te dad pa skyes nas rang
212a8: ma ma smram gakyi sas kyil / bye ba ngags rgyas byung ga gan sras bu dpa sa pa yin na/ chen gyi da da pa pas smras pa/ rje'asas da gas/ basmras pa/ de ba ma ldan das bya 'bar tu ga du pa'i mang pa
212b1: 'dra 'chos bshad pa padza da/ de thos pas srog chags pa sto grag drams bya par chen po rtogs so// des smras pa/ rje'i sras sa sa rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang cas pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de medade/ sangs rgyas blang ba ni khyed cas khonas
212b2: 'bras bu dang bcas pa lags kyi/ bdag cag la ni ma lags so// ci'i phyir 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dubyung ba ni skyes pa rnams kyi phyir lags kyi bud med rnams kyi phyir ni ma lags so// des smras pa/ bzang po de skad pa smra shig/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems
212b3: can thams cad la phan pa dang / thugs brtse ba yin gyis song shig dang / khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan d+hag ma thos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ g+ha shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du ba'ad la/ lha'i mdun du ba na
212b4: sum du bdag gis ches brtan pag yar tsha lags so/ / 'di ltar gal te lha sa dro bzhudan bdag gis kyang smad bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan par bgyi'o// shAkya'i ming chen gyis bsams pa/ zhal gsol gyis 'gro'o snyam pa las yang bas pas pa/ rang ga su ma'i tshad
212b5: la lha la gsol ba byed mi phod kyis/ lha ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la bkur sti mar du byed de/ de'i tshig nyan par 'gyur bas de la don 'di rig par bya'o snyam nas/ de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau to ma'i la don de smras pa
212b6: dang des smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ lhal gsol bar bgyi'o// de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma rnams la smras pa dang de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung pa dang / gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skye dgu'i bdag po chen mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdas
212b7: mo chen po gau ta ma'i la 'di skad ces smras so/ / gau ta pa'i mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan ba snyan pa'i chos sbyar pa'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das
212b8: las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos de thos par 'tshal gyis bdag cag gi phyir lha la ci nas kyang lha ni sde dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhun la/ bdag cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol cig/ des smras pa/ thun
213a1: sodag khyod kyis sems bskyed pa legs te/ rgyal po zos gtsang la btag gis skad cig sdod cig/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i zas gtsang gdan ba deng song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang la 'din ces smras so// lhamakhyen par ma
213a2: c ig bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas snyan ba sun pa'i chos spang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas pa lta bu bshad pan 'khor brgya phrag drum dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan ba stan pa'i chos nyan to shes thos
213a3: so shAkya'i mchis brang rnams kyis kyang de skad thos nas de rnams chos nyan par 'tshal na lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so/ / bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis brang rnams der de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar slangad dro mchi bar bgyi'o//
213a4: deci'i phyir zhe na/ snga dron de rnams bsdum pa'i bgyi bdag bgyid pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i skabs ma mchis so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun du spyod pa ni gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i sa tshig smras pa de'i tshe lus kyi spu zing
213a5: zhes byed nas langs te/ re shig skye dgu'i bdag me tshon mo'i tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi 'dug pa yin pas des mgo bos btud de smras pa/ gau ta ma'i bka' bzhin 'tshal/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i shAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/
213a6: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // ji tsa mon shAkya mi chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de dang lhan cig song ste gzugs dang la co dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas 'dod
213a7: chags dang ma bral bdag chags pa ste bar zhugs pa de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas smras pa/ sring mor shig khyod kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang bzang mo bltan sdug pa mdzes pa yin na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyod
213a8: rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dir 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni me legs pa zhig byas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yang ma yin no zhes de la de skad smras pa dang / ngo tsho ba snying la phog pas spyi bo smad nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/
213b1: rgyan rnams bzol nas sems 'ongs su du cing 'dug pa las/ de'i midag gzhug ma bu mo bskyed pa zhes bya ba dang / de lhan cig chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i 'ongs pas des de la bos te smras pa/ bskyed pa song la rgyan 'di dag khyis du 'og la shog shig/ de rings par
213b2: bod nas des khyis du bzhag ste slar 'ongs so/ / de nas skye dbu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig rngu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do//
213b3: shad ga badzad pa de'i rtso rdzi tsam na shAkya'i bu bo zhigs bral ba na mu tig gdo shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar lta zhingadi lag pas nom par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsams so// 'on kyang da cos lam
213b4: gdo ci cig gi do shal kho na la rtog par byed do/ / ming chen gyi chung ma das pas shAH'i bu mo mgul pan mu tig gi doshal btags par myur bskur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di sam dusems te/ nyon mongs 'di'adu byed
213b5: rnams 'ad ltar mirtag par bshadad na mu tig gi doshal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bar brtag tu ci yod/ gal te bdag gi su tig gi phreng ba mtho na 'di'i tshigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ngo snyam dubasams nas mdag gzhug sa'i dra
213b6: mo rnyed pa la smras pa/ brnyed ma thong la khom du ga gdog la zung du khyer te/ c-i / de co ma tan pa del sems bathus pas 'di mas du sems te/ zung 'di'i ba mal dan padag domo po mdags pa cos kyi dzu /
213b7: man pa phyi ba zhi kyang ba zug pas dumams sa cwal dang yi sa pam gas thaMs smras / gang yang smrigapas rdulagalas pa dang // de shegs galan pa ma sa na lag/
213b8: dngos gzhan dang sdug pardzal mang po tho med// bdag ga'atsho ba rjin pas las kyis ngo dan// de das bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas du dgos te/ bu mo bskyed pa 'di don gyisangs rgyas rnams lalhag par byababyas pa yid yod ci/ tshe chung nin mo ma
214a1: 'di 'khor ba'i btson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis grog la/ dge ma skye ba byung na ni/ 'jig pa yin par bsams nas su// ngas gsungs pa yi dge ba la// brtson 'grus bskyed nas mnyan par bya// zhes bris nas byin no/
214a2: de nas bu mo bskyed ma dga' ba dang / mgu pa dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshogs su bcad pa smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang / las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can
214a3: rnams la ni/ / 'bras bu dag tu 'byung ba nyid// ces bya ba yin pas tshe chung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed pa de badrus ma zhig gis bsang ngo // de sangs rgyas la sems mngon par dang par byas te shi bas sing ga la'i gling du sing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo ma pa'i sa
214a4: du skyes par gyur te/ gang gi nyi ma la nying mtshams sbyor ba kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi char ba bab po// rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug sde smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhums su zhugs pa de'i mthu lags so//
214a5: dzaM tsaman mngal gyi smin par bya ba'i phyir de sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grag cing grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang / dro ba ni dro ba'i yo byad dang / sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang khab ma yin pa dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang lan tshwa can ma yin pa dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin
214a6: pa dang / ha cang rtsub pa ma yin pa dang / ha cang bska pa ma yin pa dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / rtsub pa dang / bskab rnams spangs pa'i kha zas kyi bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dngos mo ngos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dag 'tshal na
214a7: nuchub bzhin du khri nis khri dang / khri'u nas khri'ur 'gro zhing 'og gis la 'babs par mi byed do// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa bltan sdug pa zhig bcas te/ gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang mu tig gi cha
214a8: bab nas rgyal pos bsams pa/ 'di ltar bu mo'i mthus mu tig gi cher 'bab pa ni de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyur ro zhes des de nyid la byin no// de nas nyi ma 'dun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas bu mo'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs
214b1: par byed do/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'di'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pas de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming mu tig can zhes gdags so// zhes de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te/ bu mo mu tig can ma ma brgyad la gtad de// bad na 'tsho ba'i mam
214b2: gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i mam gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i mam gnyis dang / rkyen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ de mam brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar dbyed
214b3: skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/ / de gang gi che chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi rigs dang 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / gnas pas rgyal po nang mi dang bcas pas lhag par bkur bsti byed do// tsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod kyi tshi ba
214b4: rnams kyis nor bgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gri bo che bslabs te/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang de rnams gru bo che phan phun med par rlung gi shugs kyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin to// de nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu
214b5: 'brang btab po/ / de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha mal ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo
214b6: sde rnams rgyas par 'don pa la zhugs pa mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar 'ukhung nas thos nas/ de nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha yul dbus kyi tshong ba rnams mchis nas mchid snyan par len to// rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag zla/ mthan
214b7: nams khug shig/ de rnams bkrug pa dang mu tig can gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag yul dbus kyi rol mo ci dra ba kho mos mnyan gyis long shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bdag cag ni rol mo mkhan ma lags te/ bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshod pa rlung gi shugs kyis
214b8: bdir mchis pa lags te/ bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung bton to// mu tig can gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa de thos nas snying dga' bas pa spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas dris pa/ sangs rgyas zhes
215a1: 5/ b+ha ba 'di tsa yin// de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid rgyas par smra ba ba rtsams te// lha mo shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i de so dang nyeb/ chu bosal ldan shing rta'i 'jam/ drang srongs su bsteganas dang hacang yang mi rig
215a2: zhig tu byung ste/ de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang / lcis mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdan dang
215a3: ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin pa
215a4: che'o/ / de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul bong pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshad bar 'gyur zhing / de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa'ang nyid chad pa med cing
215a5: mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dang ba yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs
215a6: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ de lta bu de ni sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba lags so// mu tig can gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dod pa de'i tshe 'o ma
215a7: la sbron cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bka' bzhin 'tshal/ sbran par bgyi'o// ji tsam na de rnams yul du 'dod pa'i dus la bab nas de rnams kyisi mu tig can la sbran pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsol pa/ lha dang lha min mi yis phyag
215a8: bgyis pa/ / ske dang snyan dang bsnyengs las des byung zhing // gtso bo grags pa rgya chen rab grags pa// drang srong bdud rtsi'i che las thugs rjes gnod// zhes gsol to// de nas yi ge de tshong pa de rnams kyis khyer nas rim gyis mnyan yod du byin pa dang / lam gyis
215b1: dub pa dal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyi tshor ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
215b2: ces gsol to/ / btsun pa sing ga la'i gling na sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid yi ge gsol pa 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mu tig can gyi 'dul ba'i rus mkhyen nas nyid kyis blangs te blags so// blags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gi khyer
215b3: cag sngar 'dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhing tshong ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo // de nas zod bskur te bsgyur ba'i zong thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
215b4: song ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mchin bdag cag gis mu tig can la ji skadab kyi bka' bu ba sol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa'i ras de ri mo mkhan dag khrag shig/ de rnams kyis ras
215b5: dang ri ma mkhan dag bkug nas phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris shig/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar brtsams pa las de bzhin gshegs
215b6: ba ni bsod nams brgya phrag dra mas bsgrubs pa yin pas ri mo mkhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ston cig dang 'od gtang ngo // de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang bcom
215b7: ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyis tshon rtse sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dpa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
215b8: yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so// gang du ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po// brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug pa bya/ 'dam bu'i khyi
216a1: la glang chen bzhin/ / 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas// chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// zhes bris nas sing ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yig sprid pa/ ras la
216a2: ri mor bris pa des mu tig can la skyes su bskur ba yin gyis/ / khyod kyis de las phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus la/ bkur sti chen pos ras 'di khrom shig/ tshong ba de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mu tig can 'di ci yin
216a3: zhes 'dri na/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'drin de dag ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
216a4: pad 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/ / 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhes 'drin spro bar bya ba yin te/ gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang 'thun
216a5: ba dang lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud ci rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las krol bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams
216a6: kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ zod khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song ste/ rim gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa da la sos te/ rgyal po'i
216a7: drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ge byin no/ / rgyal pos yi ge blags te blags nas grong khyer de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng / dar gyi tshun 'phyang mang po btags shing
216a8: du dri zhim po'i bog por nye bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tsho gas bsogs nas/ de nas bkur sti chen po byas te grong khyer gyi dbus su rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams te/ ngas phye ba dang skye
216b1: bo'i tshogs chen pos sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bstod de smras so// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can dad pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gas deb spre zing zhes byed cing mig mchi mas gdabs zhabs gnyis la gtugs te tshod
216b2: pa rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis smra bar brtsams pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lags so// 'og ma 'di dag ci yin/ 'di ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang 'thun pa dang
216b3: lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/ / 'di ni 'dud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags so// gong ma 'di ci yin/ spro bar bgyi ba lags te/ gang zhig skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te
216b4: lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba lags so/ / de nas mu tig can gyis rten cing
216b5: 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi 'thun pa bsam par brtsams te/ ji srid lan gsum du ma bzlas pa de'i bar du des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
216b6: mngon sum du byas te/ nges bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// shes rab mig ni nam sbyangs pas// gang la 'di 'dra'i gsos mnga' ba// sman mkhan de la phyag 'tshal lo// ringan bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
216b7: kyis/ / lta ba'i ri bo drungs phyung ste// lta ba'i zug rngu sel mdzad pa// sman mkhan de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes tshigs su bcad pas smras nas tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag khyed cag nam 'dod pa de'i tshe kho mo la skyon cig// de nas tshong ba rnams
216b8: kyes zod rnams bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zod rnams khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung du song ste/ lha mo bdag cag mchin bdag cag gis ci zhig bgyi bar bka' stsal par gsol/ des smras pa/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
217a1: 'tshol la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ma/ stobs dang bde ba dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das
217a2: kyis mdzad de/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshegs gnyen bcom ldan 'das las brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams las ni rkang pa byung / lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag/ 'khor ba las ni rgyang bsrings// khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtshoni bskams/ rus
217a3: pa'i ri bo las ni bskal/ ngan song gi sgo ni bkram/ mtho ris thar pa'i sgon bye/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa
