253b8: tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin du dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi tshun phyed mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go/ de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi
254a1: dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams bskad mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong / / blon po rnams bsnyed mos chal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di mu'i bskad mos tshal/
254a2: kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so// de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gnon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ ci'i phyir slar ldog/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i bskyed las tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tug la rung / blon po rnams kyis
254a3: smras pa/ lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di 'gal ba ci mchis de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bskyed mos 'tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/ lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so//
254a4: rgyal po chas pa dang bskyed mos tshal na kun co'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bskyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra/ grag na 'di ni su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams
254a5: spangs so/ / blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang par gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams sprug par chas pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas
254a6: smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig mchen de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa da ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye ba'i tshogs chen po dang de bas
254a7: lhan cig chas te zhag bdun grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo sde nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyas so/ / blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na sgo chod cig/ de nas gzhon
254a8: nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i skyil po dag byas te gnas btab ste ri dgas
254b1: bas cing bsang nas 'tsha bar byed cing dus gsus cadang phreng sar m+bu'i bstiganas su dad par byed da/ / yang ca dang dngal bab pa' drags pas can pas 'ad gas byas gan phyin ta gzang / pa sgrub sa yang ba byu / dza yangs ga'adunagan
254b2: dang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir skye bo bsed bes dpar gyur / de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shing tu nyen pas so// des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs la/ mes dben gyi srid ma rnams
254b3: dang lhan cig 'dug shig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ram/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo // de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga'
254b4: ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi srin mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu po dang bu mo dag btsas te de rnams chen por
254b5: gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas rbang srong ser skya'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid dus btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi tshor ma ni sra yin pas sems rtse
254b6: gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so/ / drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan lus chi na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag la phog shig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin/
254b7: pas des gser gyi bya ma bus blangs te chu'i rgyan gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so// drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to// de rnams der
254b8: 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por zur te dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/ / lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams des song ste grong khyer gcig shes brtsigs nas lhas bstan lngas
255a1: bstan zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spags pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na bdag
255a2: cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs par mi bya ste gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/ / de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma gcig len gyi rigs mnyam pa las chung ma gnyis pa na me len to// de nas dus gzhan zhig
255a3: nargyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran te blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong ba dag gzhon nu de rnams de lta gang na 'dug/ de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig las spags pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di
255a4: nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong sere skra'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ri de bzhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te/ mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur
255a5: spyod par bgyid pa na bu po dang bu mo dag btsas so/ / grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed pod dam/ lha rdo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stong bsad nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du rjod pas ched du brjod pa/ kye ma
255a6: gnon nu rnams ni thod pa yin no/ / kyem gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu bod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu byung ste/ kyem gzhon nu rnams ni bod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon na rnams ni gan du bod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur
255a7: to/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shid pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur to// de yang bu med par sha nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go// de yang bu med par shinas lag na rgyal por
255a8: gyur to/ / de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dral rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur te/ de'i bu gnas 'jog go/ gau ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bus khyim mo// gau ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang
255b1: sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / sha ta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / ga'u bcu pa dang / ga'u brgya pa dang / gzhungs
255b2: bcu pa dang / gzhu N+Dal dang / gzhu ba kra dang / gzhu brtan no// go ta ma dag ga'u btan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge'i 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgran// go ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu bogs je snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni seng ge'i 'gram ma chog tu gags so//
255b3: gotom dag seng ga'i 'gram la bu bzhiste/ bas gca da/ zas dkar dang / khre bo zas dag char mdams so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / za bo ma dang tshad ma ma'o/ khas gtsang la buganyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dab tshe dang ldan pa dag po'o/ a drA Sh+Ta
255b4: la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// the bo bas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha sbyin no// gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sang ngo // dkar mo'i
255b5: bu ni phreng ba can no/ / bre mo ma'i bu ni bzang len no// tshad med ma'i bu dge 'grel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan zin yin te/ gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur ba'i rgyud tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i breng rgyun chad/ skye ba'i 'khor bzang
255b6: nga ni yang srid pa med do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi 'chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud kal gyi bu legs so// legs
255b7: so maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi bdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so/ / maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi
255b8: gtam rtag tu smos shig dang / des don de rnams la yun ring po 'don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon gyi shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las/
256a1: brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig/ zung shig/ lhogs shig/ de ci'i phyi she na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas
256a2: tshangs par spyod pa'i ba dang ldan pa yin/ / dge slong dag rigs kyi bdad pas rab tu byung ba sa shAHrnams kyi sngon gyi rigs d+hAd las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzang zhing klag pa'i rigs so// de nas mer skya'i gzhi'i gA kya rnams
256a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yid nga nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mag pas byug zas te bcom ldan 'das kyi kun snga nas dadong do// de'i tshe mang khyer ser skya'i gan rgyal po seng gen
256a4: 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / zab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun mod cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur
256a5: pa/ 'bras dang / bu ra ma shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byedaH
256a6: 'jug ste/ 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / ba ram shing
256a7: gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he pAn sa mtshogs pan 'gacig pa la sdug pa bzhin duHl+yA sa ste/ byung byed do// rtul po legs par rab sa kyi ban nA mA dam pa gzugs bzang gu bsnun sdug pa/ mdzes pa yul gyi bzang
256a8: mo la ma bi ni zhes bya ba yod do/ / lhas bstan na khyim bdag phrag cing nor mang ba langs spyod chab/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi phu la nor gyis 'gram pa zhig gnas
256b1: pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin ye'i kun dga' rab dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po rum dus su btsun mo'i 'khor
256b2: dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/ / lum bi ni sa de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la su la du gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi
256b3: yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum pa ni'i tshad du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig
256b4: byed du bcug nas de'i ming lus bi ni'i tshil zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par rab
256b5: sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan gin par byed/ dag par byed/ dga' ma gung spyod par byed pa las dus
256b6: gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pa de'i gzugs
256b7: bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul
256b8: yin snyam mo/ / de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cing gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ltas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tsheH
257a1: lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phran sum tshogs par gyur to/
257a2: zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na mi zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so// zhes mchi lags pas debs na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags sa zhes de'i mang spu 'phrul zhes
257a3: btags so/ / bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar
257a4: 'gyur zhing stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ / yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang mo
257a5: rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig bcas so/ / de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ spu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus
257a6: so/ / de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ blon po rnams kyis spras pa/ rdzu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas debs na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes
257a7: bgyi bar gdags so zhes bstags so/ / de yang bskyed pa sangs nas chen mo gyur ba dang de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes pa chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni labor
257a8: los myur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ / rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsa' ba ni sgyu 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcigs
257b1: ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig
257b2: btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge'i 'gram gyis slar sprid pa/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu
257b3: l a dgos mod kyi 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes
257b4: lung bstan pa re shig 'dod do/ / gcig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bsgre'o// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir gol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te/
257b5: rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas lha skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho ba rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul spang bar mi nus so//
257b6: lhagazhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa de sbyin bltan gtong ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal par bgyi'o// rgyal pos
257b7: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gcad la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste meg pa'o// de nas shAkya rnams mgunas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams
257b8: bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo/ / shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bca' ba sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma bzhag par mi bya'o// zhes
258a1: bcas po/ / lha mi khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin du bsdam gyi dral bar mi byan/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gcig slong ba na mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no// l+h+wa ru
258a2: gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya gtang nas kho bos tshogs la brtags zin gyis/ bu mo gcig shos kyang spyi shig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bsgri ste gzhon nu
258a3: zas gtsad gis gnyis kazangs so/ / ji tsaman dus gzhan zhigan rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas ser skya'i gzhin rgyal ponas gtsang rgyal srid byeng du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/
258a4: po dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chos rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin
258a5: rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ / des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen po dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gni skyes pa med par dong nas rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// 'di
258a6: ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / rus la gzigs pa dang / rgud
258a7: la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang
258a8: chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs
258b1: da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal
258b2: rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
258b3: rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na
258b4: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang /
258b5: ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slongs mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ yul dbus 'di ni bu ram
258b6: shing gi brang ba dang / 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun bum tshogs pa/ slongs mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye ba mod pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan
258b7: dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor bablangs par bya snyam mo/ / 'di ltar bya
258b8: chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i ngus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa chu 'dis na byang chub
259a1: sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs pa na mdzad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ldan gyi gnas/
259a2: na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig du 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi
259a3: lan la mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi
259a4: mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skye bar bya bar dka' la/ blun zhing dbang po rtul pa dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar
259a5: 'grib pa la brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas
259a6: bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i
259a7: dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa
259a8: yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci
259b1: 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin pa gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs brgyad 'di ni
259b2: b tsun par bkur zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas chud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar
259b3: bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
259b4: ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'das na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud gang gis bud med la gzigs par
259b5: mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rul du nying mtshams sbyor ba la ne snyam na/ bud
259b6: med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig
259b7: ces smon las btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mnyam par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni
259b8: mames dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
260a1: rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag
260a2: byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang
260a3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas gzigs pa lnga gzigs nas 'dod pan
260a4: spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du grogs po/ / grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la de'i bur gyur te/ bdud rtsi
260a5: rtogs par byas/ khyod cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
260a6: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig/ daltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu'i gling rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su spogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
260a7: drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/ / de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / spra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang / kAt+tha'i bu nog can dang
260a8: gcer bub gnyen gyi bu'o/ / rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze cus rgyal dang / bram ze gnas rdeg dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms
260b1: par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / stu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'bur dang / kun du chu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can no// 'dir na/
260b2: ches mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag cag gis
260b3: thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun rin po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyi bar sems lags so// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha
260b4: rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs shig/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs pa dang byang chub sems dpas kyang dung
260b5: bus te sbas pa/ grogs po dag 'di la snga lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so// grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ gnas pa
260b6: de bzhin du ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas/ bdud ci rtogs par byas te bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o//
260b7: rtag pa dud 'brang bar bya'o// stong pa nyid kyang 'dung par bya'o// bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o// zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan
260b8: zan chags ni du ma 'joms/ rdo rje gcig/ gis zag gi/ rtse mo du ma 'jigs/ @#/ gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'dzums
261a1: nyi ma gcig gisi mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ / grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer bde yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/ de nas
261a2: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis/ mal bdag gis de la gzi brjid
261a3: bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so// de nas byang chub sems
261a4: dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas nam gyi gung thun la glang po cher bstan te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so//
261a5: smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes nas/ lha rnams la bsko de nas shi 'phos te// nang par sprin dum nyi ma gsar 'char ltar// de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums su zhugs/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/
261a6: glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rus dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / ri brag chen po la 'jog pa dang / bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o// des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang /
261a7: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khrag shig/ de dag gis rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos de rnams la
261a8: rmi lam bsnyad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan chos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas papa
261b1: rtswa ngan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos dung smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
261b2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya bar 'jig rten du smra rnam par grags par 'thar ro/ / bar sdom pa/ 'chi 'pho lha dang rin poH// zung brgyad du ba dang brtsam thugs brtan// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems
261b3: dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshes chen po 'di shin du g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi mun pa mun nag/
261b4: srag tu gyur pa gang du nyi mar dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to// der sems can gang dag smras pa de dag rang gi lag pa bcang
261b5: yang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ / shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes bya bar shes so//
261b6: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'dog pa ni lag na ral gri dang / lag na
261b7: mang dang / lag nam dang bu dang / lag nam 'apo che'o// chos nyid kyis gang gi byang chu sems dpa' yum gyi skams na zhugs pa ni mdzod cin sa gzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi drim dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi drimi dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung bcwa
261b8: tshogs kyis ma sngags pa so/ / dper na nor bu rin bo che'i ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nong bu rin po ches mi gas pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi sdums na bzhugs
262a1: pan mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs pas ma sbags so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan
262a2: 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / dper na nor bu rin po che ni bai dUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po'i rigs dang ldan pa/ dad pa/ gsal ba/ dri ma
262a3: med pa tshon skud sna lnga sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan la brgyus pa de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o// 'di ni nor bu'o// skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin
262a4: du/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo // chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan
262a5: 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas ngal ba 'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs
262a6: ba de'i tshe yum deng phan chad ji srid 'tshe'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog go// mabyin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smrab
262a7: dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ sbyar ba'i chang dang 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed de// srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / brdzun du mi smra chang la mi
262a8: brkam dang / 'khrig pa'i mtshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di// 'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod
262b1: pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtong ba med do/ / nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing // de ni 'dod chus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la// de yumal 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi// skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtong ba med//
262b2: sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di
262b3: 'di lte bu'i 'dod pa ste/ mtshan ma pan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar
262b4: 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blung na cir 'gyur/ sras yan lag mtshang ba zhig bcas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga ming zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag pa
262b5: tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun du rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byed pa zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang / des de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan te
262b6: chu blung ba dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma brtson thams cad thar par bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos brtson thams cad thar bar byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa
262b7: de dang bral bar gyur ro/ / gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur te/
262b8: gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag gis bskyed mos tshal ba lta'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos bskyed mos tsha la bstan nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag bskyed mos
263a1: tshal du dag par bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal ba legs par bas la lum na cal nas kya sa mas chal 'donas de rgyal bzas ga gas spang ba/ byang kya thum brgyad mas tshal du grob dod kyis bskyed
263a2: mamatshal byad phyos shig/ de sa zhogs dgal bskob/ shes lan dgang skyed mos tshal gyid myos sheg/ de rnams kyis bskyed mas chal byed byas sa// de nas de 'a rnams dang kun ga dang // de nas des sum na
263a3: tshal du 'chags pa na shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin du rgyas bzhig mthong ste/ de bltam par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni chags pa dang ldan
263a4: bas sna po'i tshogs chen pas bskor na bal+h+wam mi phod kyis thabs shig ba sham par bya'o snyam nas des rlung dang char drag po cig sprul nas des skye bo'i tshogs de kun du bros so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid mam
263a5: na mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdang ba dang / des bltam par brtsams so// byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa dang / brgya byin gyis lpags pa'i gleb mos bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems
263a6: dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to// byang chub
263a7: sems dpa'as bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka thong shig/ thong shig/ phar thong shig/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di yang g.yos par gyur zhes bya ba nas shes ldan dag sems can
263a8: gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ / shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad bcu gnyis pa/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems
263b1: dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa na ral gri thubs nas byung ba bzhin du mngal gyi drim dang / shama'i drim dang / khrag gi ri mi dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis mgos so// chos

263b8: lha'i mitog ma dra rabs kyang 'thor ro/ / l+h+wa'as la stan rnams kyis kyang sgra 'argyan to// gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do// bar sdom la// bltam dang bzhengs dang gam pa bdun// chu kun gnyis dang rgya mig sa/
264a1: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe rgyal po bzhi yang bu btsas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ba btsas
264a2: pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes gtags so/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu
264a3: bcas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar bltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ / kau sha ma bi na rgyal po dmag brgya ba'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du
264a4: sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar mur bas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so// grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du
264a5: sems te/ bdagag cwabacas pan 'jig rten ldan ma ltang snang bar byur pas na'i mingang rabastsung shes bya bar bdags se zhes rtags nyid di snyam yin no// 'on cang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no//
264a6: kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'dzag pa la mkhas 'chags pa la mabs bzhig gnas te/ de tshe ba ni mis byin zhes bya'o// des de la dus dus su 'jig pa'i gtam dang 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas
264a7: dede las rab tubyung ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pan 'di rten thams cad spa ba rgya chen po sa gsal bar gyur to// de'i tshe mis byin drug du zhugs te/ bas pa gtan byed pa nides sbed pa
264a8: mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa/ mngon po// 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag/ gcig chang byung bar gyur tam ci// 'di stir rin cig pa cas pa// 'din 'ad kyis gsal bar gyur/ nyin mongs med kyis de la smras pa/
264b1: nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du no// bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni// yan lag reg na 'od bsil bas// nges par thub pa de yi 'od// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen yin// nges par lhums nas blta ma gyur la// bltam nas sems//
264b2: dpa' chen po de'i// 'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni// dri ma med pa 'di dag gis// 'jig rten gsum ni sdud par byas// mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltar mchi'o// des smras pa/ bu da
264b3: ltar byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dang / dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing bzhugs pas gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir
264b4: byed nas de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dod do/ / gang gi nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te/
264b5: lnga brgya dang / rim gro ma rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya bcas so// baglad mo lnga brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang 'brangs so// gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo // khams kyis rgyal phran rnams
264b6: kyis kyang dargya bral te/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar byung ba smras pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
264b7: gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/ 'di lta ste don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnod sbyin shA
264b8: 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ / shAn+ya rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u 'am bu mo bcas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAH'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir brid pa yin pas rgyal
265a1: bas blan rnams la bskas/ shas ldan dag dang la gzhan nu gnad sbyin shAkya' bal gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shag/ lha bka' bzhan 'tshal nas blan pa rnams kyis rgyal ba zas gcang la panyan
265a2: nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhag nas grong khye ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ sar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gcu lums can/ rngub pa/ btsam pa med pa
265a3: de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na thub pa gzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsabs pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lugs can
265a4: ba tsam pa med pa yin na gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa gtags pa 'di lta ste shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems
265a5: dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byin pa dang / gnad sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa 'thod ngo // mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs
265a6: pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so// rgyal pos zos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag lhas kyang gnon nu'i rkang pa gnyis
265a7: la gdugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bdags so// zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa btags pa 'di lta ste lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bltam
265a8: ba'i mod la yab dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu la dus dus su u mnye byos shig/ dus dus su khrus byos shig/ dus dus su zas byin cig/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig/
265b1: mam dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su bsku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do// yang de'i tshe dri shin du yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin
265b2: pade rnams kyis thugs shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis dablangs te bar du gzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' baspyad do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam
265b3: pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas shes ldan dag / ji ga gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ gal te
265b4: khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor
265b5: la na po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / te rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o// bung bar brtul bod pa yan lag mchog
265b6: gan grub dang mnapa/ pharos gyi sa rab tu mngoms pa/ de rtsa ba tshal thug pa'i sa men pa mams par gdad par slab pad cing 'chab mad pa 'di nyid cad pa med cing mtshon gyis bad ba pang la/ sa dang drad
265b7: bas legs par bab te gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gal te sgra dang ba spu bregs nas gos drang smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs par grabatsam
265b8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan napa/ shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su
266a1: 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po gang dag yin/ lha gzhon nu'i
266a2: zhabs shin tug nas pa lags so/ / zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo
266a3: rtsi bas stong bse ba dang mu lung du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ wa 'di ni zhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lu gzhon nu ni sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi ting pa yangs pa dang /
266a4: de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha zags pa ni dper na shing bal gyi mdab ma'am sa bal gyi mdab ma bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
266a5: lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ni dper na dang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no// lha 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//
266a6: wa gzhon nu ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku ma dud pa dang / sru bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag bras mo'i lha gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha 'di ni
266a7: gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni mdoms kyi sra bsrubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i mdoms kyis bsrubs su nub pa ni dbor na glang po cang shes kyi'am rta cang shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no// lA 'di ni
266a8: skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni su ji srid par mdom yang de srid la 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
266b1: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni sku ro stod spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang mthing ka la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil par skye lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//
266b2: lha gzhon nu ni mdog gser dang 'dra ba dang / 'od mdom gang ba dang / lpags pa srab cing mdog gsar 'dra ba lags te/ lpags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i
266b3: mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung mgo gnyis dang / lhag pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i/ skyes bu chen po'i
266b4: mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang / skur sto sa dge'i 'dra ba dang / sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mogo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshams
266b5: thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang / 'gram pa se ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab
266b6: pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas sgra mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes
266b7: bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha gzhon nu'i gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la bidi ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//
267a1: lha gzhon nu ni spyan mthon maming la pa jim lta bu dang / dbugatsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smi mtshams kyi mdzad budung ltar dka shing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/ lha 'di gan
267a2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ / lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i khro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du rtsa rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// zhes
267a3: bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis lags so/ / gal te gzhon nu rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems
267a4: dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de sbran pa'i yum nongs par 'gyur te/ nongs ma thag du sum bcun gsum pa'i lha'i ris gya nom par skye bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shA
267a5: thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bor
267a6: gser las mgar ba'i mtham pas rgyan brdungs pa lab dkar po sar pa'i steng du gzhag na shin du gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/
267a7: mi'i kha dog las 'das shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par sbed
267a8: pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad ma'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no/ / sdom la/ mig ri 'dzums dang rnam smin dang / gsung snyan 'jebs pa
267b1: mangs pa bzlas/ / ma na kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskas par bad nas spyan mi 'dzums pa garlags rnams las te/ de kun mi 'dzums pa da dper nasus pa na gsus kyi lha dmas pad nyid kyis kyang dran
267b2: sems dpa' bltas pa'i yod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas des na de nyin dang / mtshan du dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug tu gzigs so/ chos nyid kyis byang chab sems dpa' blta ba
267b3: ba'i mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na gangs can gyi bya gad snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / ying du'ong ba de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bltas par
267b4: mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bltam pa'i mong nas mkhas pa gsal ba yid bzhungs pa rgyud las 'byung ba'i shes rab dpyod pa
267b5: dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dang shes rab kyi sa so sor 'byed par byed do// de nas mes byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po
267b6: byang chubs pas dpa'i sar skya'i gzhing byon nas de'i mtshan yang gsum gtags kyis/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir bzung ngo // des smras pa/ de bzhin bya'o// de gnyis chas pa dang / byang chubs pas dpa'i mthus rdzu 'phrul
267b7: nyabs nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir bzhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor son pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongs med lha
267b8: zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de song nas rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan nyon mongs mdal sru zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa dang /
268a1: rgyal la zas gtsang gis bkur ste sngon du 'gra ba'i mchad lan sbyang a ma tsad nas stan bltabs te zhug pa dang / rgyal po zas gcang gis bshes pa'i gtam kyis kun dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srang can pa
268a2: dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa// khyod kyi sras ni mthong bar 'tshal// 'jig rten gtsa ba rnams 'dren pa// thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal// rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de la ni gzhon nu nyal gyi sems
268a3: gyi bar du re shig skad cig sngong cig/ des smras pa/ lha mnal log pa nyid pa lta'o// de bzhin gyis shig/ des ji tsam na byang chub sems dpanga' mig sa btsums par gzugs rnams la lta thong nas tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa
268a4: ta rnams ni/ / mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar// dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi gnyid// mig la yun ring mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod kyi mams par du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis
268a5: kyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la bstan lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bstan to// de rnams kyis ji skad du lung bstan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes
268a6: bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ rtsod pa'i dus na 'khod
268a7: los sgyur mi 'gyur/ / bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni// nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// mtshan migs la dang ldan na mi dbang po// gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur// thub dbang mtshan ni shani tu gsal bsan/
268a8: mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo 'gyur// zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu pazhes nas khab nas gyur nas lo drug tu dka' ba
268b1: spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur bar mthong ngo // bdag ni par skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur bar mthong nas de me gi mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med rnams
268b2: gyis gang mthong na/ / rims par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba// lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas// drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur// gang las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa 'am// tshe zang 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang // de ni myur du legs
268b3: par bdag la smos/ / khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur// drang srong nan mangs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las// rdo rje ser drag 'phangs pabab gyur kyang // thub pa chen po'i skul bsun// gam gcig cang
268b4: ma kyirnams/ / ma dzA ga shAHsa kyis 'as pa dang // mnan nan pa shA ma nga// rA 'i drug dang sbrul gyi gnan da/ gzhan nus pa bzla 'dzag par 'gyur// sngags rnas ny-id la gnas bya shi gas/
